story:
The barriers to entry into the world of high fashion design are notoriously high. For someone like myself with modest financial resources, it can almost seem insurmountable.

Furthermore, public funding in my province of Ontario in Canada is non-existent for fashion designers.

I refuse to accept that because I do not come from wealth that I cannot pursue my dream.

With your generous contributions, we can help to bring the barriers down. It will enable me to produce my first full high fashion collection to be viewed at Fashion Art Toronto on April 16, 2016 by fashion media, buyers and influencers. This can potentially lead to the launch of a brand new global fashion brand.
With this campaign, I hope to generate a powerful message that a career in high fashion design can be attainable if you simply possess the talent, passion and drive to succeed.

To learn more, please visit : www.lafemmetheberge.com

...........................................................................................

...........................................................................................

With your support...

The goal is to raise $15,000 to be able to complete the collection to show at Fashion Art Toronto (F.A.T.) in April of this year.

Visit their website : www.fashionarttoronto.ca

The money will be used to :

  • purchase fabric and materials and,

  • pay for an extra set of hands to help in producing the collection.

Everything will be produced in my in-home studio.

The perks are all designed or handmade by myself. I believe that everyone deserves to wear something that is made with love and attention to detail and I’m excited to provide these beautiful perks to my generous contributors.


...........................................................................................

Help us out by choosing a perk

Fashion Illustration Postcard - $25 CAD

Fashion illustration print: Inspired by the tenth look of the collection.
Shipping to Canada and continental USA is INCLUDED

Gold Theberge keychain - $40 CAD

Theberge engraved gold key chain. $5 from each item sold will go to Hearts of Gold Foundation.
Shipping to Canada and continental USA is INCLUDED


Box of 5 greeting cards - $60 CAD

Five blank greeting cards with envelopes.  Five different fashion illustrations of looks from the debut collection are featured. Two of the images will remain a mystery until the collection is unveiled. 
Shipping to Canada and continental USA is INCLUDED


Framed Fashion Print - $85 CAD

Inspired by looks from the debut collection these framed fashion illustration prints boldly display the love and detail that I put into everything I create.

Shipping to Canada and continental USA is INCLUDED

Hand-Beaded Gunmetal brooch - $110 CAD (early bird price)

These hand beaded, 1.25" x 1.25" diamond shaped, hematite brooches are the best way of taking a piece of this debut collection with you anywhere you go. This beading technique is a prominent feature throughout the collection. 

Shipping to Canada and continental USA is INCLUDED


Transparent Beaded bracelet - $180 CAD (early bird price)

This hand beaded, 1" wide, transparent and white bracelet is backed with the softest white leather and adds instant sophistication to any outfit. (Quantities are limited)

Shipping to Canada and continental USA is INCLUDED

Hematite Beaded Wrist Cuff - $485 (Only 6 available)

Make a statement without saying a word. This 2" wide cuff is embroidered with hematite, semi-precious stones, onyx, crystal and glass beads. It is backed with a soft leather and sturdy clasp. 

(Quantities are limited) 

Shipping to Canada and continental USA is INCLUDED



Fashion Painting - $600 CAD

Hand painted acrylic fashion illustrations. 12" x 36" canvas. Inspired by looks from the debut collection. Only three available (one of each illustration below). If you select this perk, send us an email at info@lafemmetheberge.com. In the subject line use, Fashion Painting 1, 2 or 3 (from left to right). First come, first serve!

Shipping to Canada and continental USA is INCLUDED


Heart painting - $1,000 CAD

30" x 40" acrylic painting on canvas.

Shipping to Canada and continental USA is INCLUDED

...........................................................................................

Hearts of Gold Foundation

Upon reaching our target, 25% of any subsequent contribution will be set aside to be donated to Hearts of Gold. In addition, $5 from each purchase of the key-chain perk will be donated to Hearts of Gold (whether we reach our goal or not).

Hearts of Gold is a registered charity based out of Cuenca, Ecuador whose mission is to raise impoverished women and children out of the shackles of poverty through education and entrepreneurship.

So far, Hearts of Gold has aided communities by:

  • Funding over $18,000 for children’s nutrition programs
  • Raising $3000 to provide critical medical supplies for an abandon seniors home
  • Providing new school shoes for 237 children in 2013
  • Impacting over 70 individuals by funding family counseling services
  • Handing out food parcels and toys to over 600 families for Christmas in 2013
  • Underwriting the education cost of 25 special needs children each school year
  • Supporting educational life-skills workshops that help teens learn about sexual abuse and pregnancy prevention
  • Creating a Rapid Response Fund to help impoverished families in times of crisis

Take a look at this descriptive video 


Visit their website for more information : Hearts of Gold Foundation

...........................................................................................

About Tanya Theberge

Some people are born to create. This rings especially true for Tanya. Just ask her parents, who have supported, and sometimes endured, Tanya’s endless creative projects around the house since she was old enough to put crayon to paper.

Tanya’s first foray in design education was at the Alberta College of Art and Design. It was during this time in her life that she gave birth to her first son. Being a single mother at that time, she made the difficult decision to put her schooling on hold. She vowed to complete her studies when her son was old enough to start grade school. She made good on that vow, but soon found herself at another crucial junction three years into her undergrad.

Tanya’s bespoke swimwear business started in 2008. Through social media referrals, the business grew beyond what she could manage while being a full time student and mother. Once again, a difficult decision was in front of her, finish her undergraduate degree or focus on the business. The business won out.

In 2011, with a growing business in its fourth year and a growing family - now with two young boys and a loving partner, Tanya and her young family moved to Toronto. She enrolled in fashion design studies at George Brown College to further her technical skills. In the summer of 2014, she fulfilled a life-long dream, studying at the prestigious  L’ecole de la Chambre Syndicale de la Couture Parisienne in Paris (http://www.ecole-couture-parisienne.com/?lang=en).

...........................................................................................

Our Amazing Partners

Special thanks to our wonderful partners, without whom this campaign just would not be possible:
  • Malika Karim - https://www.linkedin.com/in/malika-karim-218389a4
  • Curtis Dez - http://www.curtisdez.com/
  • Hearts of Gold Foundation - http://heartsofgoldfoundation.org/
  • Luevo - http://www.luevo.com/
  • Fashion Art Toronto - http://fashionarttoronto.ca/

...........................................................................................

Risks & Challenges

If we don't reach the $15,000 goal the plan is to continue to press on with completing the collection for F.A.T. using the funds raised. We may have to make compromises to the quality of the fabrics and materials.

...........................................................................................

Spread the word

I completely understand if you are financially unable to support our campaign by selecting a perk. If so, we would appreciate your support by sharing our story on social media

story:
ISGLOVES is uniquely designed for you to use your touch screen devices in the chilly winter. Made of Eco-friendly materials, ISGLOVES brings warmth, comfort and convenience, for the Sporty, Techy and Fashion-Conscious!

How ISGLOVES was born

Charmain found herself in the middle of a Swedish winter when she was in Sweden in 2010/11. With temperatures nearing 0°F, Charmain realized she could no longer use her touch screen devices with normal gloves on. Her friend, who was also caught in the same winter as her, had to use his nose to answer phone calls in the cold. Refusing to submit to Nature, Charmain shopped around and managed to find gloves with conductive tips but these were not warm enough for such a harsh winter.  



While she was able to operate her touch screen devices, Charmain’s heart continued to long for the comfort and warmth that her insulating mittens used to provide.
With the winter getting colder and colder each day, Charmain seeked out other individuals who found motivation in life by solving people' real-life problems, sharing with them her desire to create a design that combined mittens with touch-gloves; they agreed her design ideals and formed a close-knitted and passionate team of designers.

The team designed prototype after prototype, improving the model with each design.




After several months of research, testing and optimising the design, the hybrid touch sensitive glove-within-a-mitten-ISGLOVES prototype was finalized. 



Why ISGLOVES Style then?


Many people felt that the original ISGLOVES was revolutionary in solving the problem raised, however many of them also requested for us to create a glove that is fashionable, to match their choice of clothes easily with the gloves worn. Many would love to wear these unique, warm and handy gloves while commuting to work or simply checking out the city.
Therefore the team gathered even more feedback, went back to their ISGLOVES design templates and redesigned the whole product from the ground up; ISGLOVES Style was hence born. 

 

Video of ISGLOVES Style


How are we Eco-friendly?

At FIETT we strongly believe we can solve a problem without creating another. Hence we designed quality and eco-friendliness into our products so that our product value to the individual is brought to the next level. ISGLOVES are made of sustainable and recycled materials, for example:

• The inner “touch” gloves are mostly made of sustainable BAMBOO fibres.
• The outer mitten comprises of Recycled Thinsulate, RPET Fabrics and PU leather which are all friendly to the environment

Hence ISGLOVES Style is COMFORTable to wear, STYLISH to look at and FRIENDLY to the ENVIRONMENT.



Who we are

We are a team of creative, young and well-travelled designers who believe in improving the quality of life in our community through creative and simple problem solving. Having lived and experienced first-hand a cold country for a long period of time, not having warm and touch-sensitive gloves was a real problem when trying to stay connected and warm at the same time. ISGLOVES was developed from our desire to design a solution that alleviated a problem commonly faced in cold countries.

We need YOUR help to manufacture ISGLOVES Style in soft, comfortable, beautiful leather.

We sincerely seek your funding of $18,000 so that we can make these wonderful gloves for yourself, your family, your friends, and everyone!

Your support will let us
• Finalize our prototype – 10%
• Make tooling for ISGLOVES – 10%
• Order the minimum quantities from the factory – 80%
• Most importantly: Solve a problem many of you face with style

And to show our appreciation, we will send you some of the very first pairs of these gloves, well crafted just for you - the techies and fashionistas. 



You can see our progress and follow us 

• On Twitter: www.twitter.com/#!/ISGLOVES
• On Facebook: www.facebook.com/ISGLOVES (don’t forget to ”like” us!)
• On our Blog: http://fiett.com/blog/wordpress/about-isgloves/

story:
ORIGIN OF ANTIKYTHERAWATCHES NAME'S

The Antikythera name comes from a Greek island where in October of 1900 a sunken wreck was found. The date of the wreck dates back in about 50 BC. Within this wreck was found an object that only in 1952 was understood to be an incredible and complex mechanism to become one of the 10 most mysterious objects in the world. 

Antikythera, Greek island

it's nice to be able to see how certain things can have a mutual attraction, so love is born between people, people and animals or simply for things. Cristina Zenato, an underwater expert who has lived in the Bahamas for so many years, has devoted a great deal of her life to achieving perfection in her relationship with "her" sharks. Passion and love two elements that help you win many battles. Antikythera has worked 2 years to realize its new product and as it is wanted to happen, Antikythera has dedicated the product to the DAMA of the SEA CRISTINA ZENATO which has accepted and signed the new creation in his honor. Passion and mutual love. Life stories and SEA DAME is born

 

WATCH DETAILS FUNCTIONS

IVEGLIA 1579 - LIMITED EDITION

IVEGLIA 1579 - LIMITED EDITION

OUR GOAL

Our goal is to create a diving watch which is stylish, robust, accurate and easy to read. 

It is a perfect multifunctional diving watch for professional & technical divers as well.

CASE : Ø44 mm, 316L Stainless Steel   ande PVD version

BEZEL: Ø41.5 mm, 316L Stainless Steel   

CROWN: Triple sealed screw down crown   

MEASUREMENT: Lug width 24,00mm, lug to lug 51,50mm, thickness 14,60mm including Sapphire and 12.4 to the bezel only   

MOVEMENT: Automatic Miyota 8215 or Limited Edition Swiss Made STP 1-11   

CRYSTAL: Sapphire glass with inner anti-reflective coating   

DIAL: Three colors with applied indices and lumed chapter ring   

LUME: Swiss Superluminova   

BEZEL: Unidirectional rotatable 120 position insert with point lume filled markers   

WATER RESITANCE: 300m 

STRAP: Scuba diver silicon strap 84mm + 135mm same dial color    

IVEGLIA 1579 was born...

In 1579 the plague was again in Europe and so in Spain so that on October 28 the Santo Spirito galleon, better known as Iveglia by the name of the commander, was forbidden to moor in Genoa. Left in the sea and sailing along the coast, the ship reached the Portofino Promontory and was shipwrecked ending up on the rocks, not being able to oppose the force of the sea and the strong wind. Very probably years later, given the shallow waters in which the ship had rested, part of the cargo was also recovered by the local inhabitants.

October 28, 2019, exactly 440 years later. the IVEGLIA galleon wants to be remembered with this commemorative watch ... IVEGLIA rises again

 

Our Design

Every detail of the ANTIKYTHERA IVEGLIA & SEA DAME project started with a series of hand-drawn sketches. We found the solution to define the rule for divers. We focused on simplifying all the complexity of the product, giving a clean and modern look that is now the core of the ANTIKYTHERA brand. After getting feedback on our concepts from a number of designers and business associates (people we knew would be interested in our product), our designs went through various revisions and were optimized so that they could be converted into drawings CAD.

BEZEL anti clockwise

STANDARD  TIMER SCUBA BEZEL VS ANTIKYTHERA COUNTDOWN SCUBA BEZEL

Look at the BEZEL crown of the Antikythera watch. The minutes are positioned in anti-clockwise sense. In the 1980s, the arrival of dive computers began to exclude the use of clocks and depth gauges from dive planning. Furthermore, the lack of a fixed reference in the bezel or dial as a memory for the end of the planned dive time is now considered an error. The concept of Countdown is much more useful, that is the count of the remaining time. The reasoning seems the same but in the first case "TIMER" we do not have a reference of the remaining time while the second case with the "COUNTDOWN" bezel, we establish the time we have to use and setting it at the minute hand when it reaches the reference ZERO, it knows that time has come to an end. It is important to take into consideration the risk of recent memory loss and overcome this problem with the help of an appropriate tool. Antikytherawatches and among the very rare tools that use this system.

NOTE TO ALL DIVERS.

This detail UNIQUE FOR THE ANTIKYTHERA WATCH IS the real evolution and consideration that today must be done to plan dives or breathe decompression gas without the risk of errors caused by our memory. THIS IS WRONG ... never working trusting in our memory. WE MUST HAVE INSTRUMENTS THAT HELP US IN PLANNING AND MANAGEMENT OF THE DIVE. Towards the end of a technical dive, to breathe a special gas to follow a safety decompression, only for time management, tables and a redundant electronic instrumentation must be used...  but above all it is "FORBIDDEN" to use our weak (immersed) memory. Just for example, imagine the pilots of airplanes, whether they are single-engine or jet pilots, never start up (starting) an aircraft using their memory to follow standard procedure, but use a checklist to follow step by step .. they are 4 pages of instructions but even after 5000 hours of flight and experience, nobody wants or thinks they should memorize them. There must be a reason!!

IVEGLIA 1579 Limited Edition - Bezel & Rule Computer details
 
 
 

Collection IVEGLIA 1579 (2019-2020)

IVEGLIA 1579 - Night Light

 

IVEGLIA 1579 - Deep Sea
 

IVEGLIA 1579 - Sunrise

IVEGLIA 1579 - Sunrise

 

IVEGLIA 1579 - Sunset

 

IVEGLIA 1579 - Deep Night

 

 To Cristina Zenato ... The real SEA DAME

 

 

IVEGLIA 1579 - SEA DAME - Cristina Zenato

 

CRISTINA ZENATO LA DAMA DEL MARE / SEA DAME

It's nice to be able to see how certain things can have a mutual attraction, so love is born between people, people and animals or simply for things. Crsitina Zenato, an underwater expert who has lived in the Bahamas for so many years, has devoted a great deal of her life to achieving perfection in her relationship with "her" sharks. Passion and love two elements that help you win many battles. Antikythera has worked 2 years to realize its new product and as it is wanted to happen, Antikythera has dedicated the product to the DAMA of the SEA CRISTINA ZENATO which has accepted and signed the new creation in his honor. Passion and mutual love. Life stories and SEA DAME is born

THE SEA DAME - CRISTINA ZENATO with his watch

THE "SEA DAME" CRISTINA ZENATO - ANTIKYTHERAWATCHES AMBASSADOR

THE "SEA DAME" CRISTINA ZENATO

IVEGLIA 1579 - SEA DAME - Cristina Zenato

IVEGLIA 1579 - LIMITED EDITION Swiss Movement 

 

 
 

IVEGLIA 1579 - LIMITED EDITION Swiss Movement 

 

2019 COLLECTION

You can choose between 6 models of our collection: we have called them IVEGLIA 1579 In commemoration of the Spanish galleon called Iveglia, sunk on October 27, 1579 in the waters off the promontory of Portofino. Even today, the only thing visible is his anchor, half-buried on a sandy bottom of 42 meters (138 ft), from which only part of the anchor appears. This is why IVEGLIA 1579 (with PVD case and brushed steel case).  

Silicon straps color combination
 
Iveglia 1579 - 1° mod. SUNSET - 2° mod. LIMITED EDITION - 3° mod. SUNRISE
 

Iveglia 1579 -1° mod. NIGHT LIGHT -2° mod. DEEP SEA - 3° mod. DEEP NIGHT

 

Color combination with watch dial color

All watches will have a silicone strap in the same color as the dial. There is the possibility of having the leather strap as an extra accessory. In Black and Brown color

Leather Straps

Leather Straps​

Leather Straps​ 

Silicon Strap 

Fitted with a highly durable, lightweight and waterproof 24mm silicone strap and an ardillon in PVD-coated stainless steel buckle for black version Antikythera Iveglia 1579 Limited Edition / Antikythera SEA DAME Cristina Zenato.  

The silicone strap ensures durability without the depolymerization of the material. ANTIKYTHERA writing on the ardillon both in PVD and in brushed steel.

The logo is engraved on the body of the strap

 

Laser engraved logo​

Glow in the dark

 

PRE-ORDER AVDANTAGES

Reduce costs because we remove rings from a commercial chain. This opportunity is the commercial revolution in order to be able to offer, albeit for a limited time, cutting-edge and current products.

SCUBADIVER RULE CALCULATOR  

Example just fo Tech scuba divers, how to calculate the pressure at the limit of O2Pp 1.4 using a Nitrox 32 (NI) 

 

I° - Collate number 10 on the outer ring with the percentage of mixture you want to calculate in this case 32 as 32% of gas mix  

II° - In the outer ring, in front at the number 14 (1.4 OTU) in the inner ring, you can see the maximum pressure not to exceed 44 ( exactly is 4,375 BAR = 33,75 mt)

 

TRAVELLERS: Exchange Rates Calculator

 I° - Collimate the number you consider "foreign currency exchange" (example in YEN) that is on the outer ring with the "10" number of the inner ring. In this case 1 US$ = 120 JP YEN (example)  

II° - Do you want to know the equivalent of 85, 850 or 8500 YEN? Look for the "85" outer ring and the value is exactly collimated with the number in the inner ring. In this case 850 YEN = 7,08 US$, 8500 YEN = 70,80 US$. (The currency exchange used was invented for example purposes only).

ANTIKYTHERA PRODUCTION

We have chosen a manufacturing company based in Northern Italy, the choice is made based on its experience, it is now a historic company in the design and realization of watches for over 50 years, so great professionalism and reliability. Another very important detail to ensure a complete and complete cycle of the project is that the company is equipped to handle large production lines. Another not uncommon fact is that the company headquarters are just 200 kilometers from our studio so this proximity was important because it allowed us to oversee the production of the Antikythera watch product line. 

Movement assembly

LIMITED EDITION or up-grade Swiss Movement STP 1-11

 

ANTIKYTHERA LIMITED EDITION Swiss Movement STP 1-11

Incablock System

STP 1-11 DATE

 

ANTIKYTHERAWATCHES - MIYOTA MOVEMENT

ANTIKYTHERA IVEGLIA 1579 / SEA DAME Miyota 8215 automatic Japan movement

Diameter                                                          11 1/2”’ (26mm)

Height                                                                5.67mm (7.4 overall)

Jewels                                                                21

Vibrations Per Hour                                       21,600 bph

Lift Angle                                                          49 degrees

Shock System                                                 Parashock

Winding Direction                                          Counterclockwise (uni-directional)

Hacking                                                             No 

Hand-Windable?                                            Yes

Stem                                                                  065-212, tap 10 (Citizen)

Hands Size                                                       1.52mm / 1.0mm / 0.17mm

Functions                                                         Hours, minutes, central seconds, date calendar

Country of Manufacture                            Japan 

 

Date Miyota 8215

Miyota Paraschock

 

 

Swiss Movement - Left STP 1-11 / Right ETA 2824-2

 

PRODUCTION TIMELINE

 

 

 

Risks & Challenges

Risks and challenges 
This project is the result of over 35 years' experience in diving passion with my natural aptitude for analytical observation and the desire to find solutions to problems. 
For the first 30 years of my professional life I successfully conquered and managed a scubadiving equipment distribution company, where I implemented my management and innovation capabilities on a daily basis. 
I have opened up new markets in Europe in the field of the distribution of underwater equipment and, thanks to a very competent and efficient team, have had a recognizable success. 
In 2003 I decided to sell my ongoing business to dedicate my time and energy to what has always been my true passion: the sea and the sky. 
Unfortunately (or fortunately!) My observation powers and the pleasure of seeking solutions to improving things and situations never left me. 
I think FLYREB first and IVEGLIA 1579 after of Antikythera is a great instruments, complete with a wristwatch, with the ability to be an aid for certain computing needs. 
Thanks to the experience gained in the aeronautical and underwater industry, together with the collaboration of my colleagues, I am convinced that I can produce an optimal product. 
I am aware of the problems of production and assembly and I can confidently say that the supporters of this project will certainly not be disappointed. 
This edition we have add also a new watch using our Ambassador CRISTINA ZENATO, SEA DAME with Cristina signature inside. Cristina has dedicated to life time to exploration, education and conservation. 
A recognized diving professional for the last twenty-four years, Cristina ZENATO shares her knowledge about oceans, sharks, caves and scuba diving. Cristina is a proud member of the Women Divers Hall of Fame, The Explorers Club, the Ocean Artists Society and a Platinum Pro5000 recipient. 
The photos above are of the prototype for the ANTIKYTHERA. There may be small changes made to the watch for the final production.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

ORIGIN OF ANTIKYTHERAWATCHES NAME'S
The Antikythera name comes from a Greek island where in October of 1900 a sunken wreck was found. The date of the wreck dates back in about 50 BC. Within this wreck was found an object that only in 1952 was understood to be an incredible and complex mechanism to become one of the 10 most mysterious objects in the world. 
Antikythera, Greek island

it's nice to be able to see how certain things can have a mutual attraction, so love is born between people, people and animals or simply for things. Cristina Zenato, an underwater expert who has lived in the Bahamas for so many years, has devoted a great deal of her life to achieving perfection in her relationship with "her" sharks. Passion and love two elements that help you win many battles. story:
B A Y S I D E.

Bayside Grooming Co. is a home-brew men's grooming supply company located in Newcastle, Australia. At Bayside, we want to make men's grooming supplies that are ethical in production and ingredients, give back to the community and provide something unique within the men's grooming industry. We found products currently on the market weren't ticking all of these boxes which is when Bayside Grooming Co. was formed. This campaign's purpose is to launch the first product from Bayside: Original Clay.

 

O R I G I N A L    C L A Y .

A handcrafted, matte hair clay that provides a long-lasting, strong hold with loads of volume and texture whilst remaining lightweight and water-soluble. It has a fresh and mild scent and is easy to apply to your hair. Natural ingredients such as beeswax, shea butter, kaolin and sea clay keep your hair and scalp healthy by leaving them conditioned and well nourished throughout the day. Whether you're going for a high-volume pompadour, a tidy slick-back or anything in between, this product provides hold all day - we can guarantee you! This product is also vegan friendly.

We have been working on Original Clay for a very long time and have recently perfected the formula, so it's ready to be brewed up and delivered to your door.

At Bayside, we aim to do our best to give back to our local community. All of our products are ethical in ingredients and production. 10% of funds from every sale go to a local debt-counselling charity.

Original Clay will come in a 4oz/115g recyclable plastic jar with directions on the jar label.

Ingredients: Aqua, Kaolin, Beeswax, Shea Butter, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Vegetable Glycerin, Silica, Coconut Oil, Emulsifying Wax, Sea Clay, Potassium Sorbate, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance (lime, coconut, bay leaf, patchouli, cedar, pine needle).

There will be a number of other products introduced to our line after the launch of Original Clay, so watch this space!

W H A T   W E   N E E D   &   W H A T   Y O U   G E T.

Bayside needs $2,750 to get off the ground. The funding ultimately will get the first product launched by helping fund production and covering the costs of setting up the business. As you can imagine, home-brewing hair products uses a lot of equipment so your generous backing will go a long way in making this happen. And of course, the final piece of the puzzle is setting up a website to sell Bayside's products.

The perks of this campaign are a pre-order of Original Clay. You can order just one, or you can commit yourself to a subscription and save loads! You will be the first people in the world to get your hands on this unique hair product. *The price of the pre-order is not indicative of the retail price of Original Clay.

 

H A N D C R A F T E D.  N A T U R A L.  A U T H E N T I C.

 

If the $2,750 goal is not reached, the product launch will still go ahead, however, it will be pushed back for a later release. Any pledge toward this campaign is greatly appreciated!

 

You can find us on Instagram @baysidegroomingco - Spread the word!
story_txt:
B A Y S I D E.
Bayside Grooming Co. is a home-brew men's grooming supply company located in Newcastle, Australia. At Bayside, we want to make men's grooming supplies that are ethical in production and ingredients, give back to the community and provide something unique within the men's grooming industry. We found products currently on the market weren't ticking all of these boxes which is when Bayside Grooming Co. was formed. This campaign's purpose is to launch the first product from Bayside: Original Clay.
 
O R I G I N A L    C L A Y .

A handcrafted, matte hair clay that provides a long-lasting, strong hold with loads of volume and texture whilst remaining lightweight and water-soluble. It has a fresh and mild scent and is easy to apply to your hair. Natural ingredients such as beeswax, shea butter, kaolin and sea clay keep your hair and scalp healthy by leaving them conditioned and well nourished throughout the day. Whether you're going for a high-volume pompadour, a tidy slick-back or anything in between, this product provides hold all day - we can guarantee you! This product is also vegan friendly.
We have been working on Original Clay for a very long time and have recently perfected the formula, so it's ready to be brewed up and delivered to your door.

At Bayside, we aim to do our best to give back to our local community. All of our products are ethical in ingredients and production. 10% of funds from every sale go to a local debt-counselling charity.
Original Clay will come in a 4oz/115g recyclable plastic jar with directions on the jar label.
Ingredients: Aqua, Kaolin, Beeswax, Shea Butter, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Vegetable Glycerin, Silica, Coconut Oil, Emulsifying Wax, Sea Clay, Potassium Sorbate, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance (lime, coconut, bay leaf, patchouli, cedar, pine needle).
There will be a number of other products introduced to our line after the launch of Original Clay, so watch this space!

W H A T   W E   N E E D   &   W H A T   Y O U   G E T.
Bayside needs $2,750 to get off the ground. The funding ultimately will get the first product launched by helping fund production and covering the costs of setting up the business. As you can imagine, home-brewing hair products uses a lot of equipment so your generous backing will go a long way in making this happen. And of course, the final piece of the puzzle is setting up a website to sell Bayside's products.
The perks of this campaign are a pre-order of Original Clay. You can order just one, or you can commit yourself to a subscription and save loads! You will be the first people in the world to get your hands on this unique hair product. *The price of the pre-order is not indicative of the retail price of Original Clay.
 
H A N D C R A F T E D.  N A T U R A L.  A U T H E N T I C.
 
If the $2,750 goal is not reached, the product launch will still go ahead, however, it will be pushed back for a later release. Any pledge toward this campaign is greatly appreciated!
 
You can find us on Instagram @baysidegroomingco - Spread the word!

story:
That’s it. We reached our minimum goal on our e-shop https://satoshi-studio.com!

300 SATOSHI_ONE READY TO MEET THEIR OWNERS IN A FEW MONTHS

274 people pre-ordered from 26 countries. ???

We even got someone from the US who bought one of each color. Thank you x4 times ????

 

However, we are a bit frustrated, because our campaign Indiegogo is stagnating since the beginning.

Our main mistake was to have campaigned on 2 different fronts: the e-shop www.satoshi-studio.com and Indiegogo (we wanted to accept crypto payments on our e-shop...).

After talking to several entrepreneurs and marketing experts, we have decided to end the Indiegogo campaign and move on to Kickstarter to solely focus on it. We will redirect future backers arriving on satoshi-studio.com to the new Kickstarter campaign as soon as it will be live.

For those who have already financially supported the project via Indiegogo, a refund should be made fairly quickly once the closure procedure is completed. We will send you an email soon.

As we discussed with a lot of people on social media and forums, we realized that our project was both appreciated by the crypto community and by people interested in fashion / innovation without having a deep knowledge on blockchain.

The first two weeks, our communication  was mainly directed towards the crypto community and we weren’t focusing enough on the benefits of our solution.

We firmly believe that we can create a whole new experience for customers with blockchain. It's a new way to own creations on top of the incredible feeling of experiencing it.

We are sure we will do something better and reach a wider audience on Kickstarter. No matter what, we will be ready to ship your sneakers in October.

Thank you for your time and your support! ⚡️⛓

Nicolas from Satoshi Studio

 

In case you missed it:

1.  We were recently featured on Highsnobiety with a great interview by Max Furr.

2.  We partnered with Arianee to build the future of valuables ownership.

3. LUKSO co-founders ordered our sneakers (and it makes us very happy).

Coming soon:

Just a matter of time before we make an official statement about it but we are joining soon the 1% For The Planet movement to work on several projects: agroforestry and eventually, sourcing of raw materials (leathers) from eco-responsible producers. Stay tuned.

story:
• LIVE FITTING of socks: Go straight to 1:55
  • LIVE FITTING with shoes: Go straight to 3:43
  • INTERVIEW: Go straight to 5:30

 

  • REALLY NO-SHOW: Go straight to 0:50
  • REALLY FITS: Go straight to 3:00
  • REALLY NON-SLIP: Go straight to 5:25

Maybe you're hearing about a no-show sock for the first time, or maybe you think you've tried all the no-show socks out there already and know all about them. But we can promise you one thing. YOU HAVE NEVER SEEN ANYTHING LIKE OUR SECRET 2.0 BEFORE. Using patented technology, we have managed to design a no-show sock that is no-show in ALL low-cut shoes AND comfortably stays on all day! Say GOODBYE to socks that show, slip-off, don't last, or are uncomfortable. Here are all the key features of the Secret 2.0 including the design and the material composition. If you're not sure, check out the live demonstration we have at the top! This is the world's FIRST REAL no-show sock. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

  • Please refer to the rate chart below. We will be using the United States Postal Service in order to provide you with the best rates possible
  • For overseas shipments, your package will be insured! But remember that you will be responsible for any customs/duties that may incur

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

A Game-Changing No-Show Sock: Designed by Sheec 

Founded in 2011 initially as a no show sock company, the mission of Sheec is to design real sock solutions that are stylish, comfortable, and functional, and bring them straight to the customer!

Let's be honest. Socks exist to add to your style and comfort, but a lot of socks in the market actually make your life worse. So we've dedicated our brand to design socks that enhance your life and your style. 

Whilst we were able to achieve the lowest cut to stay on in 2012 with the Secret 1.0, we've spent many years trying to design the ultimate no-show sock that would not only be the lowest cut to stay on, but also so comfortable that it felt like 2nd skin. There were definitely times when even we thought such a perfect no-show sock really would be impossible. But we've finally managed to achieve all that a perfect no-show sock needs through technological advances! The Secret 2.0 is a REAL no-show sock that fits ALL feet with US shoe sizes 5-12 while STAYING ON COMFORTABLY. In other words, we've designed A REAL LIFE-ALTERING GAME-CHANGING SOCK. There's enough to worry about in your daily lives that you shouldn't be worrying over your socks.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Q: What is the difference between Sheec SoleHugger Secret 2.0 and other no-show socks?

A: 

1) Secret 2.0 stays hidden in ALL low-cut shoes. There is no other  sock that is as low-cut as the Secret 2.0

2) Secret 2.0 stays on ALL the time, no matter what.

3) Secret 2.0 is comfortable in all low-cut shoes.

 

Q: How do I know the socks really won't show? How low do these go?

A: We've spent a  lot of time designing and adjusting the cut of the socks. They are super low-cut on the toes and sides and have been no-show in every type of low-cut shoes we have tested them in, including ballerina flats. We spent a lot of time, energy, and resources trying to find every type of low-cut shoe to test that they don't show.

 

Q: How do I know the socks really won't slip off?

A: We have  personally tested how long the socks go without slipping off. We've worn them  all day and put our feet through regular activity (traveling to and from work,  walking around, etc) and also all day with strenuous activity (involving  running around, jumping, etc) and the socks did not slip off once. They also did not slip off when we went to take off our shoes at the end of the day.

 

Q: How do I know the socks will really fit my size 5 or size  12 feet?

A: We tested our  socks on many types of feet...REAL feet...including both men and women, to make  sure that we felt confident to say that they will fit most feet perfectly like they are tailored to fit.

 

Q: When will my item be  shipped?

A: We expected our offers should be available to ship out in August.  We will closely monitor the schedule and update you with any changes.

 

Q: Do I add the shipping  fee to the pledge amount or is it charged later? How much does it cost to ship  overseas?

A: Shipping within the USA is free! Overseas shipping costs vary  from country to country. These shipping options and fees will be applied when  you select the rewards level.

 

Q: How much will the retail price be?

A: One pair of socks will retail for $10.

 

Q: What is your return  policy and warranty?

A: Unfortunately,  socks do not come with a lifetime warranty. However, we strive to provide  personal customer service. Should you experience any issues with the socks,  please contact us and we will work to resolve your issue!

 

Q: What size should I  purchase?

A:  Our socks are sized  using shoe sizing for easy communication.

  • A small is designed for women with US shoe size 5-7
  • A medium is designed for women with US shoe size 7.5-9.5
  • A large is designed for women with US shoe size 10-12

* Please refer to our size chart for further shoe conversions.

 

Q: What if I'm between  sizes?

A: While both sizes will fit you, most likely you  are between sizes because 1 foot is larger than the other. In this case, while  both sock sizes will fit (which ever two you are between), we would recommend  you go with the larger size for a more comfortable fit.

 

Q: How do I care for the socks?

A: Just as you would care for your other delicates! We recommend handwash or delicate cycle cold! Followed by air drying. They dry super super quickly!

 

Q: What's the best way to  contact the Sheec team?

A: You may reach out to us using the Indiegogo platform or any one of our social media channels. We are extremely fast in  responding because we value your time.

A small is designed for women with US shoe size 5-7

* Please refer to our size chart for further shoe conversions. Q: What if I'm between  sizes?A: While both sizes will fit you, most likely you  are between sizes because 1 foot is larger than the other. story:
Giorgio at work

Tyrrell P34 - One of Giorgio's iconic drawings

Giorgio Piola’s career started as a bet between brothers. A friendly challenge to settle the debate as to who’s illustrations were strong enough to be published in the leading motorsport magazines of the era. Giorgio won, racing headfirst into a career analyzing the technical designs of Formula One machines and quickly taking pole position in an industry that didn’t exist.

Drawing of Ferrari SF16-H steering wheel

Giorgio and Colin Chapman

Giorgio discussing cars with journalists

For the last 50 years,  and after a record breaking 808 Grand Prix covered, Giorgio has profiled every change in design and engineering for every car on the grid. In a sport where victory is determined by mere hundredths of a second, it is often the most minute change that makes all the difference.

Ferrari SF17H front brake detail​

WITH A $350 PLEDGE YOU GET...

Giorgio’s trained eye allowed him to painstakingly recreate and document each new design without missing a beat. He studied ground effect aerodynamics, passionately recreated the designs of the infamous, hell-raising V12 engines with poetic precision and documented the integration of the now commonplace carbon fiber chassis. Suffice to say, there is nothing Giorgio hasn’t seen.

Giorgio with longtime friend and William's legendary engineer Patrick Head

Giorgio doing an autograph to four-time World Champion" Sebastian Vettel

Giorgio's drawing of the Mercedes F1 W07

Giorgio working on an engine drawing

 

 

 

Who better to speak to what constitutes Formula One inspired designs than the sport watch brand created by the man who spent a lifetime illustrating the defining designs of Formula One? A career spent meticulously drafting the most transcendent engineering, of the best racing machine, has given Giorgio an invaluable education on enduring design, evidenced by this new venture that so eloquently conveys the precision, passion and performance necessary for success at the pinnacle of motorsport

Limited Edition G5 Swiss Chrono

 

As Giorgio states: "There are a lot of parallels between the world of car racing and the world of watches. Both, are based in mechanical engineering, performance and beauty. My career covering Formula 1 and my love for watches has inspired me to translate the passion of racing into a timepiece. I want to give my followers and all of those who love motorsport the opportunity to have a watch that reflects the precision, excitement and beauty that made them fans of Formula 1.

 

 

 

The Giorgio Piola brand was launched in 2017 with three limited edition models. Since then, the brand has expanded to two collections, several sub-collections and almost 25 models that cover quartz and mechanical timepieces that are consistent with Giorgio's vision of bringing the spirit of racing into watchmaking.

Sample of existing Giorgio Piola watch collection

Movements for the Giorgio Piola G5 Chrono Movement

Giorgio Piola G5 movement and case

At Giorgio Piola's website you can discover what Giorgio has been up to in his quest for the perfect racing watch.

 

 

 

What started as a bet between two brothers and gave Giorgio a career in Formula 1, also brought his skills to watches and culminated with the SHIFT Collection. This is Giorgio at his finest by bringing his Formula 1 inspirations into a watch that embodies the aesthetics and the engineering that define this sport. Also, this is Giorgio's most personal watch creation as each timepiece will have one of his drawing engraved on the back, making each one an individual and collectible item. Furthermore, Giorgio's dream was to make this watch affordable to all racing fans, despite their budget and without sacrificing in quality. In this sense,  thanks to Kickstarter funding and a direct-to-customer distribution strategy the cost of these watches will be extremely competitive compared to other offerings currently in the watch market. Here is where your pledge becomes essential and will make a difference: it will allow for better production planning and cost negotiations with suppliers which will translate into a more affordable timepiece that can be enjoyed by many racing fans throughout the world!

Black SHIFT

Black SHIFT

Black SHIFT

Back of Black SHIFT

Blue SHIFT

Blue SHIFT

Blue SHIFT

Back of Blue SHIFT

Red SHIFT

Red SHIFT

Red SHIFT

Back of Red SHIFT

Green SHIFT

Green SHIFT

Green SHIFT

Back of Green SHIFT

Black SHIFT

Blue SHIFT

Green SHIFT

Red SHIFT

Black SHIFT

Blue SHIFT

Green SHIFT

Red SHIFT

 

 

Case diameter: 46.5mm

Case thickness: 15.0mm

Opening: 37.0mm

Total watch length (including strap): 250.0mm with buckle

Strap width at lugs: 22.0mm

Buckle width: inner width 22.0mm, outer width 29.9mm

Watch weight: 150 g

 

 

 

It is well regarded that Swiss Made watches are the pinnacle of horological excellence. 

The customized base movement in the SHIFT watches is produced by Ronda AG based in Lausen, Basel-Landschaft.

The company dates back to 1946. Movements manufactured by Ronda have been and are at the heart of some of the most illustrious brands in Swiss watchmaking. 

Beyond the precision, intelligence and detail needed to manufacture watches at this level of consistency and quality is a dedication to preserving a historical legacy of timekeeping excellence that stretches back over 200 year. 

Year after year the Swiss Watch Industry sets new standards of excellence and storied brands continue to produce timepieces that are historical milestones in this fascinating craft blending metallurgy, physics, style, ergonomics and design.

By managing minute tolerances and creating standards of performance reliability – it is not without great care and consideration that the Swiss Made label is used. 

The SHIFT is assembled with absolute care, by hand, in Switzerland to deliver the exhilaration and an emotional resonance while still being utterly durable and dependable 

The SHIFT collection was born in Italy from the mind of Giorgio Piola, but Made in Switzerland and to be worn globally.

 

 

 

  • GP01 - Custom modified Giorgio Piola movement based of Ronda 5040.D 
  • Analog quartz movement
  • 13 Jewel
  • Frequency: 32,768 Hz
  • Gold Plated Back
  • Chronograph function counting tenths of a second, seconds and minutes
  • Date function
  • Small seconds counter
  •  

SHIFT Box

SHIFT Box

 

Early idea for the SHIFT

Subsequent drawing where the brake caliper concept is first introduced

Evolution of the design of the chronograph display

All elements come together to give the SHIFT its unique aesthetics

 

Worksheet for the SHIFT collection

Worksheet for the SHIFT collection

Worksheet for the SHIFT collection

 

WITH A $700 PLEDGE YOU GET...

WITH A $1,050 PLEDGE YOU GET...

WITH A $1,400 PLEDGE YOU GET...

Autographed poster by Giorgio

Carbon fiber money clip

Traveler pouch

Traveler pouch

Gift Box

Gift Box

Gift Box Open

Interior of gift box (rendering)

  • All Giorgio Piola watches have a 3 year warranty. More details here. 
  • All Giorgio Piola watches have a 90 day return policy. More details here.

Here is where your pledge becomes essential and will make a difference: it will allow for better production planning and cost negotiations with suppliers which will translate into a more affordable timepiece that can be enjoyed by many racing fans throughout the world!Black SHIFTBlack SHIFTBlack SHIFTBack of Black SHIFTBlue SHIFTBlue SHIFTBlue SHIFTBack of Blue SHIFTRed SHIFTRed SHIFTRed SHIFTBack of Red SHIFTGreen SHIFTGreen SHIFTGreen SHIFTBack of Green SHIFTBlack SHIFTBlue SHIFTGreen SHIFTRed SHIFTBlack SHIFTBlue SHIFTGreen SHIFTRed SHIFT  Case diameter: 46.5mmCase thickness: 15.0mmOpening: 37.0mmTotal watch length (including strap): 250.0mm with buckleStrap width at lugs: 22.0mmBuckle width: inner width 22.0mm, outer width 29.9mmWatch weight: 150 g   It is well regarded that Swiss Made watches are the pinnacle of horological excellence. The customized base movement in the SHIFT watches is produced by Ronda AG based in Lausen, Basel-Landschaft.The company dates back to 1946. Movements manufactured by Ronda have been and are at the heart of some of the most illustrious brands in Swiss watchmaking. Beyond the precision, intelligence and detail needed to manufacture watches at this level of consistency and quality is a dedication to preserving a historical legacy of timekeeping excellence that stretches back over 200 year. Year after year the Swiss Watch Industry sets new standards of excellence and storied brands continue to produce timepieces that are historical milestones in this fascinating craft blending metallurgy, physics, style, ergonomics and design.By managing minute tolerances and creating standards of performance reliability – it is not without great care and consideration that the Swiss Made label is used. The SHIFT is assembled with absolute care, by hand, in Switzerland to deliver the exhilaration and an emotional resonance while still being utterly durable and dependable The SHIFT collection was born in Italy from the mind of Giorgio Piola, but Made in Switzerland and to be worn globally.   
GP01 - Custom modified Giorgio Piola movement based of Ronda 5040.D 
Analog quartz movement
13 Jewel
Frequency: 32,768 Hz
Gold Plated Back
Chronograph function counting tenths of a second, seconds and minutes
Date function
Small seconds counter
 
SHIFT BoxSHIFT Box Early idea for the SHIFTSubsequent drawing where the brake caliper concept is first introducedEvolution of the design of the chronograph displayAll elements come together to give the SHIFT its unique aesthetics Worksheet for the SHIFT collectionWorksheet for the SHIFT collectionWorksheet for the SHIFT collection WITH A $700 PLEDGE YOU GET...WITH A $1,050 PLEDGE YOU GET...WITH A $1,400 PLEDGE YOU GET...Autographed poster by GiorgioCarbon fiber money clipTraveler pouchTraveler pouchGift BoxGift BoxGift Box OpenInterior of gift box (rendering)
All Giorgio Piola watches have a 3 year warranty. More details here. 

All Giorgio Piola watches have a 90 day return policy. More details here.

story:
So see it here:

 

 

Do you see the changing letter "I" and "O" on the disc in the middle of the watch and creating text "tick-tock"? 

When you will be wearing this watch, people will notice the rotating disc first - and will like it. Out "tick tock concept" is low key - some of them will see, some not - but be sure - people will compliment your watch.

 

 

SERIES ALPHA

 

 

 

 

 

SERIES ALPHA - MODELS

 

 

 

SERIES PHI

 

 

 

SERIES PHI - MODELS

 

 

 

 If you like the watch from Phi series, you are choosing between models B1, B2 or B3.

Phi Φ is used as a symbol for the golden ratio, has been claimed to have held a special fascination for at least 2,400 years. There are claims the number was used by Leonardo da Vinci in the painting of the Mona Lisa, by the Greeks in building the Parthenon and by ancient Egyptians in the construction of the Great Pyramid of Khufu. This watch model will catch the attention with harmony and shape.

We tested it. People will ask approach you. Will ask questions about the watch and will compliment it. Great icebreaker  or small talk starter.

 

WATCH PARAMETERS

 

• 316L Stainless steel case and back  
• Japan movement 
• Case diameter: 42 mm
• Case height: 10 mm 
• Fine mesh watch band (silver or black)
• Band width: 22mm
• Band length 80+110mm -> wrist size 14,5 - 24mm (suitable even for smaller hands)
• Water resistance:10 ATM 
• Glass: hardened mineral

• add-on: the novelty of our concept and quality craftsmanship.

 

ABOUT US

 

  Anton´s  passion is creativity. And watches. Doing something extraordinary, enjoy ordinary.

 

  Slavo is a designer. Hard working, keeping eye on details. Practically oriented.   

Thank you for your support!

story:
As seen in 

The Gadget Flow--Feature

EIN Priess Wire 

Examiner.com 


The Uni Charge Universal Charging Station offers consumers an unparalleled solution to charge any brand smartphone, tablet, e-reader or wearable device with a single powerful unit!  The Uni Charge is a unique and comprehensive charging solution with a sharp attractive design. 

The Uni Charge works with the latest iDevices (iPhone 6 and 5, iPad, iPod touch), Android and Windows devices such as phones, tablets & e-readers from various manufacturers (Samsung, Google, Nokia, Amazon, LG, Motorola, HTC, Sony) and many more micro USB-based charging devices.


One year ago we ventured out to create a solution for charging various smartphones and wearable devices, eliminating the need for multiple cables. Today, we are excited to announce that the Uni Charge allows you to charge almost any smartphone, tablet, e-reader, smart watch, fitness tracker, and even some heart rate monitors, all in one station!
Uni Charge's unique Connector Selector wheel (Patent in Process)  gives a one stop solution for charging almost any smart device on the market!
  • Plug in the micro USB cable
  • Rotate the wheel to select the connector for your device: Apple, Samsung, Google, Amazon, Nokia, LG, HTC, Motorola, Sony or any brand name device that has a micro USB connector for charging
  • Insert the device in the connector and start charging
 Only one cable is needed to charge any brand or device. 



Two additional USB ports are provided on the side to charge any other device when needed.

Apple MFI certified connector on the wheel

Estimated Dimensions (in.) : 6 L X 2.75 W X 1.6 H 

Estimated weight : 0.4 lbs

Material : UL approved Resin (PC, PC-ABS)

Stretch Goal 1 ($30,000)

Color Option
Uni Charge is currently designed with two color options: Black or White.  With your contributions and help, if we reach $30,000 we will add additional color options:Silver, Brown or Pink.
Contributors can indicate their choice of color during their contribution.
Uni Charge being used in our office


Stretch Goal 2 ($60,000)
Uni Charge Plus - with Built-in ReChargeable Battery

Uni Charge Plus comes with a built-in rechargeable battery that is ideal for people on the go.  Charge the device in any USB port and then take it with you to your ball game, beach party, flight, hotel stay or your next cruise trip.  It's the perfect device for any outdoor location.  Charge your phone and smartwatch (with watch holder accessory shown below) in your car and also let your friends charge their phones without worrying if they are using the same brand phone as you.

Uni Charge Plus brings true cableless charging on the go!

Battery Specs

Li-ion rechargeable battery, custom made with overcharge protection.  Will be UN DOT 38.3 certified and CE ceritfied.  Built in safety protection circuit with 3100 mAh  to get you plenty of charge when your device runs out of power.

We are working with a leading power supply/battery manufacturer to design the battery.  Safety circuit protection, charge circuit & fuel gauge with LED indicator are all part of Uni Charge Plus.

Estimated Dimensions (in.) : 6.25 L X 2.7 W X 1.8 H

Estimated weight : 0.65 lbs

CAD exploded view of Uni Charge Plus

Pictures of Uni Charge Plus Prototype in our neighborhood park with random users


Stretch Goal 3 ($70,000)
Uni Charge Watch Holder 
We will add the Uni Charge Watch Holder to all contributors who help us reach the goal at no additional cost.
  • Connect the watch holder to one of the two USB Ports in Uni Charge or Uni Charge Plus
  • Slide in your smart wearable device and charge it with the cable provided by the device manufacturer
  • Adjustable feature accommodates straps of different sizes
Use it with your Uni Charge, or use the watch holder just by itself and plug into any USB port on your computer, notebook or car.

Working Prototype 

Stretch Goal 4 ($90,000)
Sliding Connectors on the wheel (Patent in Process) - For devices with a case
We learned valuable input from our prototype users.  With their input we have already made some changes to the Uni Charge and Uni Charge Plus by removing the back rest and adding a sliding support to easily fit into a pocket or handbag.
We also understood that most smartphone and tablet users have a case and a common complaint is that the case must be removed in order to dock/charge on their existing docking stations. 
With this input we have already designed and made a few working prototypes with our sliding/floating connector (Patent in Process) to allow easy charging for devices with cases. This unique Patent in Process design sets us apart from rest of the charging/docking stations on the market.




Uni Charge and Uni Charge Plus will accommodate almost all phones and tablets with a case up to 2.5mm thick. 
 Note: It is not possible to accommodate all types of cases as there is no governing standard for case thickness amongst various manufacturers.

Time Line

Campaign End -- Early Jan 2015
Tool Fabrication and Component Orders -- Feb 2015
Assembling and shipping of Uni Charge -- April 2015
Lab tests and certifications for Uni Charge Plus -- Feb and Mar 2015
Assembling and shipping of Uni Charge Plus -- April/May 2015
About our team
Created by an experienced team of engineers, including Balaji Raghunathan, Francois Lindsay and Brian Le of California-based Rapid Conn Inc, they share rich experience in design and development of interconnect solutions for set top box & satellite communication devices, smart wearable devices, fitness tracking products, etc.
The team has extensive experience in managing suppliers in the U. S. and Asia to fulfill orders to our contributors. Your product will be supported by our strong U.S.-based customer service, procurement & shipping team.
Why Uni Charge ?
The Uni Charge can charge any smartphone or tablet in the same time it would take to charge using a regular wall outlet - the convenience factor is why the Uni Charge is perfect for any home or travel need.
With smartphones and smart wearables/watches becoming a multi-billion dollar market, we noticed a unique problem where there are so many cables needed to charge these units.  Each home has different devices from various brands and different charging cables everywhere clogging the wall outlet - the Uni Charge is a "must own" to clean up cable clutter.
We are very confident to get Uni Charge and Uni Charge Plus in your hands within a reasonable time using our years of experience in managing suppliers in the U.S. and Asia.  With your help we are ready to start!
Scaleability
A special feature of Uni Charge and Uni Charge Plus is that the design factor is easily scaleable to add a variety of features down the road with your support.
Digital display, alarm clock, speakers, audio in, WiFi, bluetooth, temperature and weather display, etc. to name a few.
Customizable
Another key feature of Uni Charge and Uni Charge Plus is that it can be customized to accommodate any design/functional needs, for example, adding clamping features to allow locking to tables in restaurants, hotels, airports, lounges to name a few.
The unique connector wheel can be imbedded in as a standard concept in cars, furniture, fitness machines, locker rooms, electronic product display stations in retail stores and the list goes on....
Why Indiegogo (Crowd Funding)
Our team has the experience in manufacturing and supplying connectors and cables, injection molded plastics for leading set top box & satellite communication equipment manufacturers and OEM's for several years. We have learned a lot of valuable lessons in managing the supply chain with suppliers in the U.S. and Asia.
This being our first consumer product we wanted to reach out to the end users directly. The overwhelming positive feedback we received from our prototype users led us to go with crowd funding and to reach users worldwide through indiegogo.


By supporting our project, contributors can help us raise capital for tool fabrication, lab tests (FCC ,CE,UN DOT 38.3), etc.  Your contributions will help us expand our team to bring you multiple next generation products that we've already conceptualized  (multiple devices at the same docking, audio out, syncing capability with phones, digital display, temp and weather forecasting, etc).
Please take a moment to share our campaign with friends and family. 
Thank you for your support! 
Special Credits : Video Resources
 Check our latest Techquark press update

story:
Thank You and Welcome!

Thank you for visiting the S-Tool project page.

We hope you decide to pledge, which you can do at any time on the right-hand side. 

And, if you do, a sincere thank you! 

S-Tool* - is the Super multi-tool

It is our pleasure to introduce to you our new invention. The idea we focused mainly on the tool has to be small and can be used on your keys, but with a maximum use tools:

  • Bottle opener - beer, plastic bottle
  • Can opener 
  • Screwdriver
  • Box opener
  • Stale Remover
  • Clamshell Buster
  • Letter opener
  • Pill Spliter
  • Scratche
  • Rope saw
  • Tag Popper
  • Coupon/paper Cuter
  • Spanners in inch or mm (depends on your country or request)
  • ¼“ Hex driver

14+ different tools in one S-Tool device on your keys

 



Slick enough to be classified a fashion/design tool.

How and what it is made of S-Tool:

is made of stainless steel, waterjet and laser-modified

History:

We have completed the design and structure stage, and our hard samples have been created perfectly. development of best design lasted several weeks.

previous generation prototype

Abou Us:

We are small factory, fully staffed and capable of large distribution. Fulfillment should take approximately 2-4 weeks, and the estimated delivery timeframe is April-May 2014. We will do our very best to ensure that everything goes according to plan and that we meet our promised deadlines!

As soon as we reach the pledged amount, the next step is to place the order with our material supplier and start mass production. Each order will then be individually packaged and shipped, and shipping time will vary depending on the destination and date of the order.

We thank you for your support in helping us bring these unique S-Tool to life!

as a thank you for your support:

Why do we need help .. 

We are a small, start-ups and ambitious company. But so far we have to all prototypes and designs producing in cooperation with another company because we have no our own production and machines. And that's why we decided to go this way - startup, get some finance and buy our own laser machine for processing steel, stainless steel and aluminum. We have much to offer in the near future, looking forward to see more great projects.


Postage: Free worldwide  

*Patent pending

story:
casaflordesigns.com


Hola from Guatemala! 

We have some exciting news to share with you - Rachel and Averie are starting an ethical apparel brand based in Guatemala! A few months ago we went on a walk along beautiful Lake Atitlán and started dreaming about our futures and our shared love for the artisans of Guatemala. 

We both have backgrounds in design and share a common passion for creating with our hands. After an hour of throwing around ideas and dreaming big - we thought, wait... we can actually do this! So here we go!

Together we are creating Casa Flor: Your clothes tell a story.

Many people are starting to question the ethics of how their clothes are produced. Unfortunately the convenience of 'fast fashion' is taking advantage of marginalized communities all over the world. It can be a daunting task to determine the origin of your clothes, but we believe it is a necessary step to solving the problem. Through Casa Flor, we promise that you’ll never have to question whether everyone involved in the construction of your clothes has been fairly compensated and honored in the workplace. 

A core principle of Casa Flor is that we believe your clothes tell a story. Our goal is to create clothes that speak of creativity and dignity from the beginning. 

Over the past few months we have been brainstorming, researching and reaching out to our mentors for guidance. There is a beautiful community of creators who are equally passionate about empowering artisans and creating ethically-made products and we feel extremely supported in this endeavor.

Meet the Team

Rachel brings textile design (hand dyeing, weaving, illustration skills), graphic design, and a bold personality to the team. Averie brings apparel design and construction (pattern making, a deep understanding of fit), artisan connections, and a fiscally conservative thought process. 

It is fitting that we met at a non-profit organization dedicated to working towards the empowerment of indigenous artisans in Guatemala.  It is because of our special relationships with many artisans in the highlands that we want Casa Flor to be based here. 

Our Goal

In our business plan, we are ready to start making sample garments. We have designed five looks that will be the first launch of Casa Flor- and we need your help! It is our goal to raise $10,000. 

Here is where the money will go:

Create Jobs:

  •   Embroidery Artisan Wages: $600
  •   Backstrap Weaving Artisan Wages: $900
  •   Footloom Weaving Artisan Wages: $2,000
  •   Natural Dye Artisan Wages: $250
  •   Tailors Wages: $1,000
  •   Staff: $2,000
Purchase Materials:
  •   Notions (Zippers, lining, thread, closures): $375
  •   Dress Form: $50
  •   Iron: $75
  •   Indiegogo perks/Fundraising materials: $700
Overhead Costs:
  •   Work Space: $1,000
  •   Transportation to and from artisan’s homes: $300
  •   Online Marketing Costs: $300

Thus far, we have invested our personal income into Casa Flor; but we need your help to really get Casa Flor moving. We very much appreciate your support in creating jobs for the incredible artisans we have met! Our common passions for design and alleviating poverty through employment is the reason we are doing this now and in this beautiful country, Guatemala. 

How to get Involved

  • Donate to our campaign. With every dollar raised, jobs are provided in Guatemala! 
  • Share this campaign on your social media pages!
  • Follow us on Instagram and Pinterest! 
  • Like our Facebook page
  • Purchase out our perks below!

Muchisimas gracias y con mucho amor,

Rachel and Averie
Founders of Casa Flor
casaflordesigns.com

Check out the Perks! 

By purchasing these perks, you are creating work for artisans living in Guatemala. 

Denver Launch Party Ticket (purchase before July 29th): $15


Embroidered Postcard: $25

Love Note: $1

Wrap Bracelet: $50

Custom Ruffle Top: $75

 


Handwoven Scarf: $100

Embroidered Top: $200

Handwoven Blanket: $500

Embroidered Tank Dress: $1,000

After an hour of throwing around ideas and dreaming big - we thought, wait... we can actually do this! So here we go!Together we are creating Casa Flor: Your clothes tell a story.Many people are starting to question the ethics of how their clothes are produced. Unfortunately the convenience of 'fast fashion' is taking advantage of marginalized communities all over the world. It can be a daunting task to determine the origin of your clothes, but we believe it is a necessary step to solving the problem. Through Casa Flor, we promise that you’ll never have to question whether everyone involved in the construction of your clothes has been fairly compensated and honored in the workplace. A core principle of Casa Flor is that we believe your clothes tell a story. Our goal is to create clothes that speak of creativity and dignity from the beginning. Over the past few months we have been brainstorming, researching and reaching out to our mentors for guidance. There is a beautiful community of creators who are equally passionate about empowering artisans and creating ethically-made products and we feel extremely supported in this endeavor.Meet the TeamRachel brings textile design (hand dyeing, weaving, illustration skills), graphic design, and a bold personality to the team. Averie brings apparel design and construction (pattern making, a deep understanding of fit), artisan connections, and a fiscally conservative thought process. It is fitting that we met at a non-profit organization dedicated to working towards the empowerment of indigenous artisans in Guatemala.  It is because of our special relationships with many artisans in the highlands that we want Casa Flor to be based here. Our GoalIn our business plan, we are ready to start making sample garments. We have designed five looks that will be the first launch of Casa Flor- and we need your help! It is our goal to raise $10,000. Here is where the money will go:Create Jobs:


  Embroidery Artisan Wages: $600


  Backstrap Weaving Artisan Wages:
$900


  Footloom Weaving Artisan Wages:
$2,000


  Natural Dye Artisan Wages: $250


  Tailors Wages: $1,000

  Staff: $2,000

Purchase Materials:

  Notions (Zippers, lining, thread,
closures): $375


  Dress Form: $50


  Iron: $75


  Indiegogo perks/Fundraising
materials: $700


Overhead Costs:

  Work Space: $1,000


  Transportation to and from artisan’s
homes: $300


  Online Marketing Costs: $300


Thus far, we have invested our personal income into Casa Flor; but we need your help to really get Casa Flor moving. We very much appreciate your support in creating jobs for the incredible artisans we have met! Our common passions for design and alleviating poverty through employment is the reason we are doing this now and in this beautiful country, Guatemala. How to get Involved

Donate to our campaign. With every dollar raised, jobs are provided in Guatemala! 


Share this campaign on your social media pages!


Follow us on Instagram and Pinterest! 


Like our Facebook page


Purchase out our perks below!


Muchisimas gracias y con mucho amor,
Rachel and AverieFounders of Casa Florcasaflordesigns.com
Check out the Perks! 
By purchasing these perks, you are creating work for artisans living in Guatemala. 

Denver Launch Party Ticket (purchase before July 29th): $15


Embroidered Postcard: $25

Love Note: $1


Wrap Bracelet: $50


Custom Ruffle Top: $75
 

Handwoven Scarf: $100


Embroidered Top: $200

Handwoven Blanket: $500

Embroidered Tank Dress: $1,000

story:
IT'S THE TIME TO DO SOMETHING ALL DRUMMERS

                    To make drummers play:
                                   - with more ease
                                   - with more comfort
                                   - with power
                          is our eternal pursuit!

      

HAVE YOU EVER SUFFERED FROM THESE PROBLEMS WHILE YOU PLAY THE DRUMS?

ASPIRAR brands worked with world famous drummer Russ Miller, to bring drummers an extraordinary professional drumming shoe.

Inspired by the style and images of the star trek franchise, the Maestro drumming shoes feature a modern & simple visual perception.


Russ Miller signature drumming shoes are super lightweight, which reduces muscle fatigue during performance.

All Aspirar Russ Miller drumming shoes are HAND MADE, features extraordinary quality and high-end leather.

Features a unique patent outsole from the ASPIRAR brand.  Designed for Heel/Toe & Down/Tap/Up  (Moellar style) foot technique. A separated rhombus unit provides better flexibility, this helps your foot movements forward and backward.  It provides better traction and prevents lateral skidding when you switch between the pedals.

The hollow design in arch area activates when your feet move up and down.  The air travels through the bottom of the shoe and out from the upper perforations, this provides better breathability.

A Custom "no-lace" design, you won't worry about the laces loosening while you are playing.

 A silica gel print in forefoot of the sock liner, makes certain your feet won't slip inside of the shoes.

An exclusive elastic material instead of a standard tongue, allows your ankles to have extremely flexible movements.

Laser perforations in medial side, provide better breathablity.

The whole upper is made of top-quality leather, this provides extraordinary comfort and a classy, yet sport inspired look.

The details of collar area.

3D heel construction, provides better stability and helps with heel stroke power.

 Designed by ASPIRAR and Russ Miller

Join the thousands of drummers already using ASPIRAR professional drumming shoes to help rocket their foot/pedal playing!

 The ASPIRAR brand is initiating this crowd funding project to share a special low "launch" price to drummers.  We hope to expose drummers around the world to the use of a specific, professional drumming shoe.  We believe this will open new doors of freedom in your playing, with more ease and comfort.  Aspirar is dedicated to the science of shoe design and the world of drumming!

Please refer to the table below where we indicate the US, EUR shoe sizes.

When you make a purchase, remember to leave us your foot size!

If you still have doubts, you have 30 days to return your pair of drumming shoes!

If returned products are new, unworn and still in their original packaging, we will return or exchange your pair, without any further action on your part, within 7 days of receipt of the returned product .  If the shoes are sized for you incorrectly, we will except returns up to 30 days.  Please contact us immediately for a "resize" return.

Returning a product is simple: just contact us at the following address: xiangwei@aspirar.cn


          Frequently Asked Questions

How do I select more than one pair of shoes?

The Indiegogo system is not configured to select several pairs. If you want to choose more than one pair, you will need to launch a separate process for each pre-order.

I pre-ordered Russ Miller signature drumming shoes, but I do not receive a confirmation email. How can I check the status of my order?

Please refer to this article on How to tell if your contribution is successful. If there is still a problem, then you may need to contact support@indiegogo.com

There was a mistake with my contribution. What happened?

Please refer to this article on errors and common contribution of steps to troubleshoot: common input errors


                HELP MAKE IT HAPPEN

                 THE WORLD OF PROFESSIONAL DRUMMING SHOES
