LASHES NEEDED A BETTER MASCARAWe were on a never-ending search for a mascara that ACTUALLY lengthened and volumized, instead of just "claiming" to. We also wanted a mascara that was safe to wear and wouldn't harm our eyes and didn't streak or clump...all without breaking the bank. We wanted a mascara that provided a confidence boost that, with each swipe, helped us conquer anything that came our way, but we never found one. So, we decided to create one! Just like a chocolate, vanilla swirl ice cream cone, the Lash Next Door consists of 2 formulas - 1 that lengthens and 1 that volumizes. It's formulated without TEA, DEA, Parabens, Sulfates, and Phthalates and is made with clean ingredients, so it's safe for your eyes! To top it off, you can apply layer on top of layer without clumps, wear it all day, and easily wash it off. Lash Next Door comes in 1 color: Blackout - a black shade perfect for all lashes!WHY CROWD FUNDING?With the love and support of our followers, we have been able to create fun and entertaining content on Youtube for over 9 years! However, cosmetics is a new category for us, and we need YOUR feedback and help to bring our next project to life. FAQs WHAT ARE THE BENEFITS OF YOUR MASCARA?Lash Next Door is:
Volumizing
Lengthening
Nourishing
Conditioning
Easy to Remove
 IS THE MASCARA FRAGRANCE-FREE?Yes, our mascara is free from Artificial Fragrances.  DOES YOUR MASCARA CONTAIN HARMFUL CHEMICALS?Our mascara is formulated without:
Triethanolamine (TEA)
Diethanolamine (DEA)
Parabens
Sulfates
Phthalates
Petrolatum
Mineral Oil
 WHAT'S TEA and DEA? WHY IS IT BAD FOR YOU?The bestselling mascaras on the market contain Triethanolamine (TEA) and Diethanolamine (DEA), which act as an emulsifier to hold the formula together, amongst other things.  TEA and DEA is a reactionary by-product of ethylene oxide and ammonia, which are both highly toxic.  DEA can react with other chemicals to create a carcinogen called nitrosodiethanolamine (NDEA).  TEA is dangerous in large doses or with long-term use and linked to cancer and respiratory toxicity.  We didn't want to expose our followers to these toxic substances.  Protecting our followers is our number one goal, and we're thrilled to be able to say that our formula is TEA- and DEA-free. HOW MANY USES CAN I GET OUT OF YOUR MASCARA?Lash Next Door mascara should last 3-5 months if applied daily, although the rate of usage will vary based on how much you apply per application and how often you use the product.  WHAT IS THE SHELF LIFE OF YOUR MASCARA?Our mascara is stable for three years unopened from the date of purchase, and six months after opening. IS YOUR MASCARA VEGAN?Our mascara does not contain any animal products or animal-derived ingredients aside from beeswax, which was sustainably sourced and responsibly harvested. IS YOUR MASCARA CRUELTY-FREE?Brooklyn & Bailey is a cruelty-free company meaning we do not test our ingredients or finished products on animals at any stage of product development.  We are entirely against animal testing and we require the same from our lab partners.  We are in the process of becoming PETA and Leaping Bunny certified.
Final product tested on animals: NO
Third-party testing on animals: NO
Ingredients tested on animals: NO, the ingredients used are not currently tested on animals.  However, all cosmetic raw materials including water were tested on animals in the past.
Animal testing required by law: NO
Sold in China: NO.
Certifications: PETA- and Leaping Bunny- application in process.
 IS YOUR MASCARA SAFE TO USE AROUND THE EYES?Yes, our mascara is safe to use around the eyes and has undergone in-vitro eye irritation tests.  However, we advise against getting product directly into the eyes; this should be avoided. WHAT IS YOUR COMMITMENT TO PRODUCT SAFETY?We are committed to selling only safe products.  Our mascara was screened and tested for safety.  We conducted standard safety and microbial tests to ensure that our product is safe for humans.  These are safe and noninvasive human skin-patch tests, not tested on animals.
Eye Irritation by Irritection In vitro*
Repeat Insult Patch Test (RIPT)
Preservative Effectiveness Test USP [51]
Microbial Examination USP [61]
Lead & Mercury
Stability
Compatibility
 IS YOUR PACKAGING RECYCLABLE?Yes, our bottles are made of polyethylene terephthalate (PET) which is recyclable. SHIPPING INFORMATION WHERE ELSE CAN I PURCHASE THIS MASCARA?At the moment, our mascara is only available for preorder through Indiegogo.  IF I PREORDER THE MASCARA NOW, WILL I HAVE IT IN TIME FOR CHRISTMAS 2017?No, as our mascara is scheduled to be in production over the holidays.  It will be ready to ship in Spring 2018. ARE YOU AVAILABLE IN OTHER COUNTRIES?At the moment, the mascara is available only in the U.S.  We are in the process of registering our mascara with other countries and working on being compliant in US, CA, EU, among other countries for 2018. RETURN & EXCHANGE POLICY WHAT IS YOUR RETURN POLICY?We want you to love your mascara.  If you are not completely satisfied with your purchase for any reason, please email us at admin@cutegirlshairstyles.com within 30 days of receipt and we will provide a return authorization and mailing information.  All returns will be refunded to the payment method that was used to process the order.  We appreciate your understanding that original shipping and handling charges are non-refundable.

story:
About us:

RedRock Shades are eco-friendly, solid, lightweight bamboo and natural wood sunglasses. Inspired by the red rocks of Southern Utah, the sunglasses fit the style of any outdoor enthusiast. So whether you are walking the beaches of Southern California, or skiing the Wasatch mountains, anyone can enjoy these sunglasses. 

Styles:

The Teragil


The Teragils are made out of natural light grain bamboo.  The frame is solid and the best part is they float. If you enjoy watersports and have ever lost a pair of your favorite shades, then you know how great this feature is, so make these your new favorite pair of shades and never lose them in the water again! Made with high quality flexible hinges to help give a comfortable secure fit.

The Panthem Bennetts

The Panthem Bennetts come with a stained wood frame and polarized lenses. These darker larger frames instantly demand attention and respect.  


Red Rock Shades FAQ:

Are the lens polarized?  YES

Will Shipping be included?  YES

How do I choose the style I want?  After the funding is over, we will send a private message to each backer so they can specify which they would like. 

Will you ship International? YES, International backers add $15 to your order to cover mail costs

What's up with the names?  This will be revealed at a later date.

Why Indiegogo?

We Need Your Help:

  • With funding, we will immediately start manufacturing and get product out to backers within 60 days
  • After the initial launch, we will start designing additional styles and give more lens options. 
  • Each backer will get a code for additional discounts for future purchases.

story:
What is My Baby Mail™?


My Baby Mail™ is an online journal for parents and family members to capture all of life's precious memories of their new babies and have it stored forever in one virtual space.


Your online journal can be viewed on any device and can be shared with family and friends as you wish. You can add videos, pictures and even record personal messages for your child, grand child, niece or nephews. When they become an adult they can watch these videos, see pictures and receive messages for years to come, over and over all at the touch of a button

Imagine receiving video messages from your Nana and Pa and re-living those memories of them anytime you like? 

I sure wish i could without having to dust off the old VCR, forever fast forwarding and rewinding trying to find those moments.



We got this idea from our beautiful daughter Mila, because when she was born, our lives changed. We wanted her to know how much we loved her and how happy she made us from the very first moment we saw her. We wanted her to somehow share this experience with us forever... more than just photos in an album or stored somewhere on a hard drive.


The idea of the 'App' came when Mila was just a few months old, she managed to grab my iPhone and with her little thumb started swiping the screen, looking through all the images as if she knew exactly what she was doing. I was so amazed.... and that's when it hit me. A virtual journal that could accessed by the touch of a button anywhere, anytime.



My own family live overseas, so it was hard for them to keep track of the development of Mila... I tried to send them updates on email and other forms of media however, i feel they didn't get to share the most special moments as she was growing.

With a special option on the 'App' you can nominate family members and friends to be able to view and add their own media to your baby's journal. This way they can see what you have posted, as well as post any special moments they may share with your child. 

I want everyone in this situation to have the freedom to share these MEMORIES and to be able to be involved in every aspect of the child's development. This is the child's journal and it's memories will be kept for them to share with their children...




During the development, similar Apps were created and due to limited budget, we only managed to complete version with limited functionality.

We have invested so much time and every last dollar we had to create this vision to make it into a reality. We believe that this application will be successful in giving families all over the world an opportunity to create and share memories with their children forever.



Why I Need Funding

My Baby Mail™ is still in the early stages of development and with the help of an investment we will be able to create and release version two with more functionality and better design so My Baby Mail becomes an iconic application. 

We have always believed in this product and we hope that you as an investor believes in the idea and its longevity. 

To get the ball rolling we need to employ advisors and designers to assist us in developing version 2. We will need to cover their costs and operating costs for the next 12 months. 

Your funding will also allow us to cover development costs and ongoing server costs, these costs are in the region of $50,000 alone. 

We will be dedicating most of this to the developers for version 2 however we will need to ensure we have enough for future developments and improvements just shortly after the release of version 2. 


Our Perks


Donate $1 and we will donate 50c to The Royal Children's Hospital

                                              


Donate $5 to help our cause, we appreciate all donations big or small

                                            


Donate $10 and we'll give you a shout out on our Thank you page

                                      


Donate $25 for an extra 25GB of storage for on your own My Baby Mail™ account

                                               


Donate $100 for an extra 100GB of storage for FREE on your My Baby Mail™ account


                                         


Donate $300 and receive a special keepsake book printed for you or family member of all the images stored on your My Baby Mail™ account


                                           

Donate $10,000 and receive 2% of shares in the profits and we will donate 2% of profits to a charity of your choice

               

 

The Impact

You will make this dream come true for us and we will be able to help create many precious memories. We guarantee to fund many charities in the future with our profits and help fund many other business' who need capital, just like us. 

  • My Baby Mail™ will be the number one "App" for parents. Your contribution will make this happen.
  • Similar apps are successful like "Tweakaboo" but it is not a houshold brand and we will accomplish that status. 


Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you don't want to contribute to this campaign with money, you can help by sharing this with your friends, family, or anyone else who might love the idea of My Baby Mail™  by using this link:

http://igg.me/at/mybabmail/x/6237806


We look forward to this adventure.


Thank you very much

story:
I invented lookie lous because I kept losing my reading glasses. Instead of wearing glasses on your head just wear your lookielous hairband and when you need to read, pull them over your eyes and voila..you can read!  I need some help, and in exchange you will get this fun innovative product, by Christmas!

Where are your glasses?            

  • On your head!

Glasses fall off your head?        

  • lookie lous stay on your head even when you lean over!

Hinges pull your hair out?           

  • No hinges on lookie lous

Bent out of shape arms?            

  • lookies do not lose their shape

Wearing glasses on your head?   

  • Headbands are meant to go on your head & glasses on your face                                  

Oh..do you really look sexier in readers?

  • Look like a rock star instead

 

lookie lous readers come in four diopters (strengths)

0.0  1.0  1.5   2.0


1.5 seems to be a hot seller if your thinking about this as a gift. lookie lous is happy to exchange at no cost to the recipient if stronger or weaker version is needed.

 

lookie lous come in 8 colors

Clear

Paris Pink

New York Black

London Gray

Los Angeles Sand

Miami Blue

Nashville Green

Vegas Violet

lookie lous are...

100 % polycarbonate

UV rated

Optically clear

Coated for scratch resistance

Super easy to clean: just wipe with a clean cloth

Retail price: $39.99

 

They're great for men and women!

 

 

Opticians recommend paris pink lookie lous to avoid eye strain due to prolonged computer use. Handy for late night online shopping! 

We are a new company with a new idea. With your help we can do the following:

  • Pay for mold costs to make the product more diverse

We learned a couple of things really quickly:

People that do not need readers want to wear lookie lous too! We are making ZERO correction versions (sunglasses!) in all colors. We also learned...do not discount people over 55! They need stronger magnification, so we are making 2.5 and 3.0. Check out our facebook page where a lovely gal over 55 posted "US GRANNIES WANT COOL THINGS TOO!"

  • Pay for marketing help

It's been super fun being a one woman show, but it is a BIG WORLD and we have a lot of territory to cover. With technology changing at such a rapid rate, I cannot keep up. I am hiring a younger person -- one of the highest in unemployment groups in our state), and she comes with a degree in graphics and a younger brain. 

  • Pay for office support

As stated, it's super fun to do it all myself, but I can help unemployment numbers here. I am hiring an over 60 person for this job. This person will help us ship website and wholesale orders along with your rewards.

  • Fund the sunglasses project

We just finished our first year with start up/mold/marketing expenses with lookie lous readers, and now we have to revise everything to include the awesome new lookie lous sunglasses. This means entirely re-vamping the website, packaging and all PR material to reflect the new product.

  • Help me continue to help

I realized through life experience and an accidental viewing of "Half the Sky" how lucky I am. I have never gone a day without food or a roof over my head. I read an interesting story about how reading glasses improve lives in 3rd world countries by increasing productivity. For me, having reading glasses allows me the luxury of reading. For others in the world, it is imperative to getting their work done. I have sent 560 pairs of lookie lous to Africa through two seperate foundations. I consider this very important. I also do not want to use it as a marketing pitch or incentive. It is just one way I can do something for others. I will continue to send the glasses to whomever needs readers and cannot afford them. lookie lous have a much longer life than traditional readers, so I hope to make a difference to many people for a long time. I am reaching out to my city as well. Feel free to contact me if you know someone who needs readers or if you have a foundation actively working to help people anywhere in the world.

What You Get

Firstly, you get to support innovation and help out a female inventor/entrepreneur--that's very cool. Secondly, you get lookie lous!
With each tier you get lookies and more lookies. Clear readers first (only readers available in clear.. it's okay.. send them to your mom) then you start getting choices- black sunglasses all the way up to your choice of readers or sunglasses in 7 colors! I have the product, so lets roll! I will ship to you before Christmas, and will be happy to include a little X-mas card if you want to send lookie lous as a gift.

 See perks details in sidebar to the right 

All lookie lous ship with a logo pouch:

The Limited Edition Cross Stitch Bag 

For perk levels $500+, you receive this great zipper pouch to match a pair (or four!) of your brand new lookie lous. With the option of personalization, these make a great, one-of-a-kind gift! 
 
 

lookie lous are great for everyone on your list!

 

Thank you for taking the time to contribute or to just look at this! We appreciate you forwarding this to your friends or just talking about lookie lous!

I also do not want to use it as a marketing pitch or incentive. It is just one way I can do something for others. I am reaching out to my city as well. Feel free to contact me if you know someone who needs readers or if you have a foundation actively working to help people anywhere in the world.
What You Get
Firstly, you get to support innovation and help out a female inventor/entrepreneur--that's very cool. Secondly, you get lookie lous!
With each tier you get lookies and more lookies. Clear readers first (only readers available in clear.. it's okay.. send them to your mom) then you start getting choices- black sunglasses all the way up to your choice of readers or sunglasses in 7 colors! I have the product, so lets roll! I will ship to you before Christmas, and will be happy to include a little X-mas card if you want to send lookie lous as a gift.

 See perks details in sidebar to the right 
All lookie lous ship with a logo pouch:

The Limited Edition Cross Stitch Bag 
For perk levels $500+, you receive this great zipper pouch to match a pair (or four!) of your brand new lookie lous. With the option of personalization, these make a great, one-of-a-kind gift!

Thank you for taking the time to contribute or to just look at this! We appreciate you forwarding this to your friends or just talking about lookie lous!

story:
para espanol clic aqui

Who We Are

Chick Boss is a socially responsible fashion accessory company with a fun name, cute logo and social mission. We seek out individuals from marginalized communities in Northern Guatemala to train as artisans and employ for higher than fair trade wages and benefits. Traditional metalsmithing and beading techniques are used to create high-style, high-quality fashion pieces that reflect the wearer's personality and commitment to irradicating poverty.

Our Challenge

Since our founding in 2010 we have created a well-respected brand, modern design style, and comprehensive infrastructure. Our training, quality control and production systems are scalable and ready to expand. Chick Boss products are now sold at Siman, one of the largest department stores in Central America, Casa del Jade, the premier supplier of Guatemalan jade jewelry and stones and soon at Novica, the web store of National Geographic.

In a meeting on August 1 of this year with Silvia Leech, owner of Casa del Jade, we started to explore the idea of adding jade to the Chick Boss line. She put together some prototypes (on very short notice I might add) and gave them to me to take back to the US. Well... see for yourself... THE JADE CHANGES EVERYTHING!

So.. we're off to 2 fashion trade shows from August 14-22 at which we will offer our line with and without jade. We need your help to help pay for those trips but more importantly now, to expand to offer GUATEMALAN JADE as part of our line.

Crowd funding donors will BE THE FIRST TO GET CHICK BOSS JEWELRY WITH CERTIFIED GUATEMALAN JADE.  

Our Accessories

Chick Boss accessories are produced using all natural materials and traditional artisanal techniques. Our accessories offer women the opportunity to wear innovative and fashionable designs, handmade by a person they can get to know personally. Each Chick Boss accessory bears the name of the artisan who made the piece. You can visit our website to find out more about the artisan.

 

Our Story

In 2001, Chick Boss founder Pat Pannell, journeyed to the Guatemalan community of San Andres for an intensive Spanish immersion program. Long story short... she fell in love with her host family, After learning that the children were not in school because they couldn't afford uniforms and books, she pledged to personally sponsor their educations up to and including university.

After a number of return trips to San Andres, Pat witnessed a growing problem in the community where an entire generation of young people were connected to each other and the global community via the use of cell phones and social media. However, their parents were economically disadvantaged; illiterate, unskilled and desperately poor, unable to provide the kind of income that would send them to school and allow them to compete in the technologically competitive world.

It was in 2010 that Pat and her sister Jeanne started Chick Boss with the goal of making a substantial, not marginal difference for families lead by parents in this forgotton region of Guatemala. 

What We Do 

Our team of management and designers have spent years working one-on-one with each artisan to develop their skills, speed and eye for quality. As each artisan advances, they are given responsibility to train the next group of employees.

Chick Boss artisans earn more than the minimum Guatemala wage and receive health and retirement benefits while working in a safe environment. Since working at the company, Chick Boss artisans have made monumental improvements in the development of their personal and professional skills, family health, education and income levels. 

 

Milestones

Chick Boss is at a turning point. Within the first two years of operations, we have built scalable business infrastructure in the U.S. and in Guatemala. Apart from hiring and providing training to individuals with no previous artisanal experience, we have: 

  • developed an exclusive brand with three very unique product designs
  • tested and refined our product designs
  • designed a website and e-commerce store
  • implemented a complex inventory and sales system
  • built a support group  of 4,000+ fans via our social media and CRM channels
  • placement in retail shops around in the U.S. and Guatemala
  • showcased our accessories at major fashion trade shows like New York International Gift, MAGIC, New World Crafts
  • garnered celebrity and press attention at the 2012 & '13 Oscars & Golden Globes Gift Lounges 

 

How You Can Help 

Here's the deal: Time is short. We have a very small window to make our campaign succeed. We're offering fabulous perks at discounted prices. Aside from spreading the word about our campaign, we're asking you to do the following:

Make a Contribution and Get our First pieces in Jade: 

$20

$30

 $40

 $90

 $130

  $250

 $750

  $1,500

$2500

Your Contribution

How will your money be spent?

You will be investing in a reputable company with a meaningful social mission. By investing your dollars, you are a force of positive change in your community and for artisans in a developing country.

Here's a breakdown of where your funds will be precisely going:

$7,250 Increased Production: We've received a BIG order from National Geographic's Artisan Shop called Novica. Now we need to fulfill it! One of our biggest challenges as a boot strapped "for purpose" business is growing fast enough to keep up with the demand. By increasing our production and stock volumes we can fulfill BIG orders like the ones above!

$7,000 Production Design & Development: We've done so well with our 2012 Ket Saq Collection that now we'd like to deepen all three Chick Boss collections with more accessories like wood and mixed metal jewelry, leather accessories, denim totes, fashionable t-shirts.

$11,500 Marketing: We've found that the most successful marketing and awareness for our company and mission has been from attending major fashion trade shows like New York International Gift, MAGIC in Vegas and New World Craft in Antiqua, Guatemala. These shows attract some of the largest wholesale and retail buyers in the world looking for fashionable products and companies like Chick Boss! We have parterned with several large jewelry companies at these shows! What sets Chick Boss apart from any other socially responsible business or non-profit is our unique approach to fulfilling our social mission.

Why Support Chick Boss?

Most of today's world problems far outnumber traditional institutions capacity to address them because of lack of funds and resources. Rather than depend solely on public and philanthropic funds, we also rely primarily on earned sales income to generate higher social return on our investment. With this approach, we're providing: 

  • a direct pathway to economic self-sufficiency for those we employ by creating jobs in the community and paying fair employment wages
  • a safer community in which we operate, by disrupting cycles of poverty, crime, homelessness and encouraging leadership
  • employment to individuals from the most desperate situations, who might not otherwise ever receive employment

FAQS

How is my order shipped?

Depending on your contribution, each reward may ship at a different time. Check the Reward Details for estimate delivery date. All domestic orders are shipped via UPS ground, except to P.O. Box addresses.

Do you ship international?

Yes, all international orders (except in Guatemala) are shipped via USPS. Please note, we charge up to $40 for international shipments. Guatemalan shipments will be charged a flat $10. Check the Reward Details for estimate delivery date. Any customs fees, duties, etc. are the responsibility of the purchaser.

What are the payment options?

Indieogogo customers may pay with Visa, Mastercard, American Express or through PayPal.

Are there any health concerns about the metals used in any of the Chick Boss collections?

Our magnetic jewelry should not be worn by people with pacemakers, or pumps. As the influence of the magnetic field produced by magnetic materials on humans is not very well known, pregnant women should first seek the advice of their physician.

How should I care for my Chick Boss jewelry? 

Our artisans seal all metals to retard the natural oxidation process. When needed, clean with a polishing cloth. Store your piece in a dry place and in its original box to maintain its original shape.

Do you customize sizes for jewelry?

No we do not.

How can I be a part of your Chick Boss team?

There are many opportunities to be join Chick Boss from hosting a Chick Boss party by inviting your friends over to shop and try on our products or by becoming an independent sales representative by promoting and selling our products. Contact us at info@chickboss.com or 866.660.2677 for more information.
story_txt:
para espanol clic aqui
Who We Are
Chick Boss is a socially responsible fashion accessory company with a fun name, cute logo and social mission. We seek out individuals from marginalized communities in Northern Guatemala to train as artisans and employ for higher than fair trade wages and benefits. Traditional metalsmithing and beading techniques are used to create high-style, high-quality fashion pieces that reflect the wearer's personality and commitment to irradicating poverty.
Our Challenge 
Since our founding in 2010 we have created a well-respected brand, modern design style, and comprehensive infrastructure. Our training, quality control and production systems are scalable and ready to expand. Chick Boss products are now sold at Siman, one of the largest department stores in Central America, Casa del Jade, the premier supplier of Guatemalan jade jewelry and stones and soon at Novica, the web store of National Geographic.
In a meeting on August 1 of this year with Silvia Leech, owner of Casa del Jade, we started to explore the idea of adding jade to the Chick Boss line. She put together some prototypes (on very short notice I might add) and gave them to me to take back to the US. Well... see for yourself... THE JADE CHANGES EVERYTHING!
So.. we're off to 2 fashion trade shows from August 14-22 at which we will offer our line with and without jade. We need your help to help pay for those trips but more importantly now, to expand to offer GUATEMALAN JADE as part of our line.
Crowd funding donors will BE THE FIRST TO GET CHICK BOSS JEWELRY WITH CERTIFIED GUATEMALAN JADE.   
Our Accessories
Chick Boss accessories are produced using all natural materials and traditional artisanal techniques. Our accessories offer women the opportunity to wear innovative and fashionable designs, handmade by a person they can get to know personally. Each Chick Boss accessory bears the name of the artisan who made the piece. You can visit our website to find out more about the artisan.
 
Our Story
In 2001, Chick Boss founder Pat Pannell, journeyed to the Guatemalan community of San Andres for an intensive Spanish immersion program. Long story short... she fell in love with her host family, After learning that the children were not in school because they couldn't afford uniforms and books, she pledged to personally sponsor their educations up to and including university.
After a number of return trips to San Andres, Pat witnessed a growing problem in the community where an entire generation of young people were connected to each other and the global community via the use of cell phones and social media. However, their parents were economically disadvantaged; illiterate, unskilled and desperately poor, unable to provide the kind of income that would send them to school and allow them to compete in the technologically competitive world.

story:
• Hello, My full name is Arbor. I grew up in  the rough streets of Chicago, Illinois without a father, so by the time I became of age I took it upon myself not to use his last name. Perhaps it's because of this I have taken an unorthodox course in my life and have always made my living from selling my creations. Some of these have included leather works, greeting cards, books I published of my etchings, calligraphy, prose and poetry, Clothing I designed in India, and Central America, musical instrument augmentations, games and toys! You check out one of my inventions at: www.Haikichi.com Also here is the www.PlanetBuddeez.com web page.

     My newest incarnation, Planet Buddeez was created as a  fun way  for children to wear their toy while  playfully teaching them that we're all connected to nature and what we do matters!

     I believe It can inspire children to make a difference in the health of our planet and the well being of all their little animal friends, the Planet Buddeez!

    There are 8 Planet Buddeez finally complete! They all include 3 pieces. A pre-shrunk quality cotton  silk screened Tee-Shirt or Hoodie.                                             A highly detailed plush finger puppet and a corresponding ecologically themed storybook that shows kids how to love and share the planet.        If you look on the web page www.PlanetBuddeez.com you'll see all 8 designs, along with Hoodie and Tee shirt colors and sizes.  After your contribution is pledged, you will get an e-mail to communicate your color, size and design choice.

  • There is a very limited inventory available now and your Indiegogo support will allow for payment and a big thank you, to release  product so perks can be shipped to you by Christmas at a substantially reduced cost! Please note that all domestic shipping is included in your perks!

    There have been several years of challenges and obtacles to over come to get to the place where PlanetBuddeez are finished and almost ready to ship!

    If the Indiegogo goal is reached we will hussle and bustle to get your perks shipped by Dec 25!!

     There is a shipping facility in southern California and all steps are in place to make this a reality, we just need the funds to release the product, get it to the warehouse and get you your awesome PlanetBuddeez perks!!

    So, If you'd like to help bring a  fun, playful line of children's clothing  into the world, that allows kids to wear their toy while teaching and inspiring them to be friends to the planet, please support Planet Buddeez, because when you stop and look around, this world is pretty amazing!!! 
  • Thank you so much, Arbor...               

  • ADULT SPECIAL PERK: Adult Size Hoodies!

     Women's Diggin' Earth (Raspberry only) Sizes S M L

    Men's Tree Hugger (Charcoal only) Sizes S M L

          Children's dreams can only come true if this world becomes a better place....

                                                                                                           Planet Buddeez

story:
Our Story

We know that people are always going through different times in their life. Sometimes it's a great experience, it can also be a bad one. FlipLife Apparel wants to provide an outlet and platform for people to be able to express that change in their life through Christ, plain and simple. No hidden messages, express yourself through clothes that mean something to you and tell a story. We want other people to question and think about it, this allows us to connect with them on a personal and spiritual level.


The Impact

FlipLife has the potential to reach people, through other people just like them. We want the brand to have an impact from the people who wear it. Once it has left the printing press, it carries a meaning for whoever puts it on. It makes a statement and shows others that you stand for change, not just another cool t-shirt, but part of a whole body of believers.

The essence of a company is only driven by what it stands for. The goals we set for FlipLife are based upon what we think is possible by the product and the result of that product being worn by people. Change isn't something you can do overnight, it takes practice and commitment. We offer that to people, the opportunity to change by what you wear.


What We Need & What You Get

We need money to make this happen, plain and simple! All of the money raised will be put towards printing and producing  our "FlipLife Spring Collection". We have about 5-6 designs already including new guys shirts, girls shirts, hoodies and beanies. This will allow us to be able to print the designs we have come up with and have our project grow! The money will also go to keeping our website up and being able to come out with new videos and photoshoots at the beginning of our spring collection. We would like to be able to contact different stores and travel to clothing shops to present our ideas to them, this will give us that shot to do just that. You will be a part of something that is actually happening, and we will document every part of it!


Once our goal date is over, we will get everything printed and send it out to you!


Examples of what we want to print:


Hoodie: "Amored" http://thefliplife.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/...

Shirt: "Building Foundations" http://thefliplife.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/...

Shirt: "He Is Infinite" http://thefliplife.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/...

Shirt: "Cherished" http://thefliplife.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/...

Shirt: "No Fear" http://thefliplife.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/...



Other Ways You Can Help

Please share this via Facebook, Twitter, MySpace, email your family and friends, make flyers! If you go to college spread the word around your campus and tell people what we are about. If you know someone who could benefit from seeing our video, share it with them!

story:
FIT FOR YOUR LIFESTYLE.

  • The Perfect Frames :: One size fits all, feather-like light weight hand made from 100% bamboo wood: a highly sustainable, eco-friendly, durable, buoyant (floats on water / water resistant) and hard material with natural anti-fungal and anti-bacterial properties. Also, according to the natural wood grains, every pair is one-of-a-kind just like you. It doesn’t get much better than that.
  • Highly Protective Lenses :: Extreme protection made from impact resistant polycarbonate lenses: 100% UVA / UVB filtering, polarized, inside anti-reflection layer, and scratch resistant layers on the front and back of the lenses for extra durability.
  • Our Guarantee :: We take pride in our work and will fix any manufacturing flaws free of charge.

These sunglasses will retail for $120 per pair.

By pledging to purchase a pair (or more) here on Indiegogo, you're not only getting a massive discount but helping an American brand that makes all of its high quality products from 100% sustainable or recycled materials grow. Your support means a lot to us!

Made with double spring aluminum hinges and a contoured nose piece for form fitting, feather-like comfort.

Epicstoke is a US based outdoor brand that creates high quality one-of-a-kind products from sustainable and recycled materials with a mission to insure that every single product has quite the story to tell that not only fits its new owner, but lives with and elevates who you are.

If you are unfamiliar with us, we previously had a successful Kickstarter campaign  that put us on the spotlight of a few top blogs like Gear Junkie, Korduroy, Thrillist, Heavy.com, 350.org and even got us an e-mail from the Shark Tank producers to be on the show (we're still undecided;)). As well, if you're a bit unsure about how we work, please just read the comments section of our Kickstarter and then feel free to read comment sections of other Kickstarters.

Launching a startup in today's world is not an easy thing to do with the take over of brands by large corporations and people forgetting that some brands like ours is run by two dudes and this is our life. As a result, we not only really care about our products and customers, but you're getting direct access to the creators for what you pay for. We might not be as cheap, but we're real. In a society as connected as we are today, personal touch seems to get disconnected. We're here to put a personality and story behind what you purchase once again. By buying a pair of these, you're not just buying a pair of sunglasses, but an experience. And an awesome one at that.

story:
As a humor therapist for many decades, I’ve learned a powerful lesson: laughter helps.

I’ve worked with children facing illness, doctors and treatments and with their families as they find that illness steals energy and attention from everyone.

We’ve discovered that laughter can help bring us back together.

That’s why I’m pursuing my project: to turn the blank faces of medical masks into   faces  of fun and hope.

Marie’s Masks $9,000 Indiegogo goal will allow us to produce these cheerfully designed medical masks in large quantities. A hospital can be a scary place for young patients. The blank traditional medical masks hide the humanness of the hospital staff and can make the atmosphere even more unsettling. Our Marie’s Masks project will offer staff a positive alternative to a faceless mask. We believe that these gentle cartoon smiles will bring smiles to patients and help reduce fear.

  • I'm a humor therapist who shows that hearty laughter helps patients and their families live better and their doctors and nurses work with less stress.
  • Location: Columbia, Maryland, United States
  • Gender: Female

  • Also Find Me On:


I’ve learned in 40 years in respiratory & humor therapy that Illness cheats children, families and caregivers. Humor helps people live better. Marie’s Masks, a Dr. Lollipop project, lightens medicine. We turn blank medical masks into fun -- honoring Marie, who laughed as she faced cancer. I’ve had a Disney artist draw a medical comic book * brought humor volunteers to hospitals * taken ill children and families to the White House * & introduced doctors, nurses and caregivers to healthy humor.

I began cheering up holocaust survivors in the family at the age of five.

I began helping  Pioneer Therapeutic Humor in 1968 

I brought hundreds of volunteers into hospitals to help thousands of patients and families by creating the Jewish Women International Humor Cart Program 

I became one of the few humor therapists to officially be on a hospital staff when Dr. Michael Berman brought me into the University of Maryland Hospital for Children. I made a mention in the Encyclopedia Brittanica's Medical Annual. 

In 1999 created the Original Dr. Lollipup Doggy Bag and Kitty Purses, now on Litter 36 of the Doggy Bags and Litter 9 of the Kitty Purses. One of our perks is an original "Dr. Lolipups" purse made in genuine faux fur as part of Litter 1 by Fabulous Furs.com in 2004 and 2005.

And I was chosen by Planeta Humano as one of six International Humaritarians.

 

GOAL for $9,000

- Purchase a pad printer, supplies and training

- Purchase medical masks and print them in larger quantities and more efficiently

- Package and mail Marie¹sMasks to medical facilities for field-testing

- Develop our website

- 2,500 Professionally Pad Printed Masks of our first face the "Randys"
story_txt:
As a humor therapist for many decades, I’ve learned a powerful lesson: laughter helps.
I’ve worked with children facing illness, doctors and treatments and with their families as they find that illness steals energy and attention from everyone.
We’ve discovered that laughter can help bring us back together.
That’s why I’m pursuing my project: to turn the blank faces of medical masks into   faces  of fun and hope.
Marie’s Masks $9,000 Indiegogo goal will allow us to produce these cheerfully designed medical masks in large quantities. A hospital can be a scary place for young patients. The blank traditional medical masks hide the humanness of the hospital staff and can make the atmosphere even more unsettling. Our Marie’s Masks project will offer staff a positive alternative to a faceless mask. We believe that these gentle cartoon smiles will bring smiles to patients and help reduce fear.


I'm a humor therapist who shows that hearty laughter helps patients and their families live better and their doctors and nurses work with less stress.

Location: Columbia, Maryland, United States


Gender: Female




Also Find Me On:







I’ve learned in 40 years in respiratory & humor therapy that Illness cheats children, families and caregivers. Humor helps people live better. Marie’s Masks, a Dr. Lollipop project, lightens medicine. We turn blank medical masks into fun -- honoring Marie, who laughed as she faced cancer. I’ve had a Disney artist draw a medical comic book * brought humor volunteers to hospitals * taken ill children and families to the White House * & introduced doctors, nurses and caregivers to healthy humor.
I began cheering up holocaust survivors in the family at the age of five.
I began helping  Pioneer Therapeutic Humor in 1968 
I brought hundreds of volunteers into hospitals to help thousands of patients and families by creating the Jewish Women International Humor Cart Program 
I became one of the few humor therapists to officially be on a hospital staff when Dr. Michael Berman brought me into the University of Maryland Hospital for Children. I made a mention in the Encyclopedia Brittanica's Medical Annual. 
In 1999 created the Original Dr. Lollipup Doggy Bag and Kitty Purses, now on Litter 36 of the Doggy Bags and Litter 9 of the Kitty Purses. One of our perks is an original "Dr. Lolipups" purse made in genuine faux fur as part of Litter 1 by Fabulous Furs.com in 2004 and 2005.
And I was chosen by Planeta Humano as one of six International Humaritarians.
 
GOAL for $9,000- Purchase a pad printer, supplies and training
- Purchase medical masks and print them in larger quantities and more efficiently
- Package and mail Marie¹sMasks to medical facilities for field-testing
- Develop our website
- 2,500 Professionally Pad Printed Masks of our first face the "Randys"

story:
Vrapit ''Virtual Gift Wrapping''

Create and customize online gift wraps

Imagine: you buy a special gift for someone you love or care about online. This could be a weekend to Paris, concert tickets to Avicii or a day of wellness. A lot of time and effort has put into selecting a fitting gift for that one person. But… How do you hand over such an online gift? And what do you do when you find out that the delivery of a gift takes a little longer then you anticipated? Do you print out the digital coupon and put it in an envelope?  Recognizable dilemma? Not any more!

VRAPIT believes in the power of giving and that a unique gift for a unique person deserves a unique
packaging. Handing over a digital coupon does not do justice to your online gift. Therefore, VRAPIT enables people who have bought online gifts to “vrap” them on their website, which then will be send to the lucky recipient(s).


Endless Gift Wrapping Possibilities


VRAPIT created a platform in which various gift wrap possibilities are combined with a variety of options. These options enable its users to add photos, a YouTube video, add music and personal notes. It is also possible to set a timer which makes sure that present can be opened by its recipient at the right time (and place).

Video



We need your support

We have been working on VRAPIT for more then a year now. So we have come a long way. Now we need to optimize our platform. For the optimization we need your support. Your support will give us the opportunity to start.

Optimize VRAPIT
We are challengend to make VRAPIT even better
All devices
Use VRAPIT on every computer, tablet and smartphone
API
Use VRAPIT directly from your favorite webshop
Algorithm
You don't know what gift to buy? With our algorithm technique we can let you pick the right gift for the right person

Why you should help?

  • Be the first to use Vrapit
  • Stop handing over that coupon, do justice to your online gift
  • Be able to give your loved ones a gift wrap they deserve
  • With our future technique you can pick the right gift for the right person
  • Be part of the best gift you can get
  • Make the Vrapit dream come true (we appreciated it)
  • Back our dream and we will give you yours
If you like the idea, please support the Vrapit dream. Every help will be well appreciated.

If you are not able to contribute to the idea, no problem, we kindely want to ask you to spread the word and make noise about our campaign. Use the Indiegogo tools to spread the word!

Award a gift, share a dream and contribute to an exciting future! Vrapit.

story:
The Story

Last year, on a trip to Japan, I found a shoe in a corner store. I brought back a few pairs as a gift for my girlfriend and everyone that saw them wanted a pair. I started to get serious about the idea of making my own pairs in march of 2011 and I've been able to boot strap the project until now (shoe pun). Sumisu Shoes are heavily inspired by those pairs I brought back, but there have been some significant changes. The kind of changes that people that read "Born to Run" will like plus some serious comfort innovation.


Now we just need your help to make it happen. Check out all the awesome reasons to give on the right, keep reading for the best reason to give. You'll get all these awesome perks when the shoes launch!



The Mission

100% of the profits from Sumisu Shoe Co. will be donated to the East Japan Earthquake relief fund. Your money will mean that these shoes will be produced without a high interest loan from the bank, so more money will be in the hands of the people that need it most. 


Where's all that cash going?

The $15,000 goal is half the story, and truthfully half the goal. If we can double that then we won't have to talk to a bank all all to make the first limited edition run happen. If we can't, this money will show the bank that we have serious interest and then we can raise more funds by traditional means.


Contributing will buy us the plane tickets we need to visit the factory and finalize the sample and will produce a 3,000 pair limited edition run of the shoes. 


These limited edition shoes will, in part, be going to the amazing people that chose to contribute on IndieGoGo. I will also send a pair to Gwen Stefani and a pair to the president.    



I'm broke, but I want to make your dreams happen.

If you can't spare a dollar, I understand. I was a college student once too. I've maxed out my credit cards making this happen so everything you do helps. Tell your friends about this project. Use the share tools on the page to get the word out. Print out this page and tack it up at your local coffee shop, tell your mom all you want for your birthday is a pair of Sumisu Shoes. 




  • 100% of profits go to East Japan Earthquake Fund
  • 100% of feet feel awesome in Sumisu Shoes
  • Contribute!
  • Share!
  • Tell your friends and make them share!




Thank you!

Chris Sanger and Sumisu Shoe Co.






  


Please Note:

Sumisu Shoes will be delivered upon completion of their manufacturing, we have a goal of January 2012. Please be sure to include an email address when you contribute so we can reach you to find out your size when the time comes!

This project is to help fund the initial run of the shoe, so they don't exist yet besides the pairs you see here!

The awesome music in the video was donated to the Project by Andrew Jansen. The song's title is Gold in Your Eyes and the band's name is Crimes.

story:
Thank you!!

Our campaign has finished and we are so appreciative to all those who contributed!!

Due to continuing interest from people and the media, we have launched a second part to our campaign. You can find it here.

This will give Katkin an even better start, allowing us to order more stock and get an online store up and running!

Love and thanks to everyone xx


What is Katkin?

Katkin is a conscious clothing company, initially offering screen printed t-shirts and totes with hand painted designs, but with a much bigger dream and vision in mind. 

My name is Kat Kinnie and Katkin is the affectionate name that my Mum has always called me. People seem to like it, so I thought it would be a great name for the company I wanted to start. For me, it is a word that represents love and I wish to spread love through my clothing designs, the way the clothing is produced and how we contribute to helping people less fortunate. 

Why have I started Katkin?

Recently I have wanted to buy ethically and sustainably produced clothing, with awesome designs and have struggled to find anything I like, so I thought I would make my own. 

I love wearing t-shirts with intriguing words and slogans across them and I thought it would be nice to design some that have positive, loving and peaceful messages. 

How does Katkin help others?

Better still, I wanted to contribute to a good cause, while spreading love and inspiration on tees and totes. So I found the Katja House Foundation through a company called B1G1 who help you to give for every product someone buys from you (Buy1Give1). 

So, for every t-shirt that you buy, we will clothe an orphaned child at Katja House in Kathmandu and for every tote you buy, we will provide shelter for one child at the orphanage for one night. 

4 designs lovingly hand painted by Kat

Choose from any of the four designs below and have it printed on your choice of a mens or womens bamboo t-shirt or a 100% organic cotton tote bag. For sizing and t-shirt style, scroll down towards the bottom of the page. 

Pictured: Raglan womens tee and Mens Classic tee

What We Need 

Darren and I are starting Katkin together. 

We need money to kick Katkin off, your kind contribution will help us to:

  • Get the first batch of t-shirts and totes made - $5000
  • Get a logo and branding designed - $1000
  • Create a basic website - $1000
  • Get some professional photography done - $1000
  • Get a video made for the website to showcase the tees and totes - $1000
  • Market the website and spread the word - $1000

Stretch goal - $15,000 

If we surpass our goal of raising $10,000  we will be able to additionally fund the following things:

  • 4 additional designs to the debut collection
  • Additional clothing options - hoodies and vests/tanks
  • Fund research into other lines, such as wooden recycled jewellery, baby Katkin and bamboo/organic cotton bed linen

What You Get

You can choose from a number of perks on the right. 

  • $5 - Gets you a heartfelt thank you on our Facebook page
  • $10 - Will contribute to our campaign and shelter one orphan for a night
  • $30 - A Katkin 100% organic cotton Tote bag and shelter one orphan for a night
  • $55 - 2 x Katkin 100% organic cotton Tote bags and shelter two orphans for a night
  • $60 - A Katkin bamboo T-shirt and clothe an orphan
  • $100 - 4 x Katkin 100% organic Tote bags and shelter four orphans for a night
  • $110 - 2 x Katkin bamboo T-shirts and clothe two orphans
  • $150 - 2 x Katkin bamboo T-shirts and 2 x 100% organic cotton Tote bags. Plus clothe two orphans and provide shelter for two orphans for a night
  • $210 - 4 x Katkin bamboo T-shirts and clothe four orphans
  • $250 - Your own positive, loving and peaceful message hand painted by Kat and printed onto a 100% organic cotton Tote bag. Plus shelter an orphan for a night. 
  • $300 - 4 x Katkin bamboo T-shirts and 4 x 100% organic Tote bags. Plus clothe four orphans and provide shelter for four orphans for a night
  • $350 - Your own positive, loving and peaceful message hand painted by Kat and printed onto a bamboo T-shirt. Plus clothe an orphan
  • $450 - Your own single positive, loving and peaceful message hand painted by Kat and printed onto a bamboo T-shirt and tote bag. Plus provide clothing and shelter for one orphan

The Tees & Totes

The Designs

1. Choose your perk

2. We'll email you and ask you to confirm your design choice, t-shirt/tote choice and sizing. (women's/men's classic or women's raglan for tees)

3. Get excited to receive your tees and totes in Feb 2014

4. Enjoy a warm fuzzy feeling inside for helping to make Katkin happen. :) 

Any of the four designs can be printed on a mens or womens t-shirt or tote bag. Here's how they look printed up. 

The Fabric

Bamboo t-shirts

Our t-shirts are made from 70% bamboo and 30% organic cotton. We have chosen to produce predominantly bamboo t-shirts because of their ethical, sustainable and health benefits. The addition of the 30% organic cotton helps to give structure and shape to the t-shirts. 

Bamboo is one of the softest, most breathable, non-allergic, and environmentally responsible fabrics in the world today.

Benefits to you

  • Naturally soft - Bamboo clothing is softer than the softest cotton. It has a natural sheen and drapes like silk or satin, yet is cheaper and more durable. 
  • Allergy reduced - Bamboo is ideal for people with sensitive skin, allergies or dermatitis. This is due to it's organic and naturally smooth fibre properties. 
  • Thermal regulating - Bamboo ensures that you are warm in the winter and cool in the summer. 
  • Absorbs moisture - Bamboo fibre is four times more absorbent than cotton. Under a microscope the fibre reveals various micro-holes, which allow the fabric to have superior absorption and evaporate human sweat rapidly. 
  • Breathable - Bamboo has exceptional breathability because of the porous qualities of its fibres; clothing made of bamboo resists clinging during hot weather or exercise. 
  • Anti-bacterial - Bamboo fabric contains a naturally occurring anti-microbial agent called kun. This prevents bacteria from cultivating on it, which means it helps keep you odour free. 

Benefits to the planet

  • Cleans the air - Bamboo gives us clean air to breathe, consumes carbon dioxide and, because bamboo forests are so dense, returns 30% more oxygen to the atmosphere than trees. 
  • Requires less energy & water to grow - It takes much less energy to grow and sustain bamboo than cotton. Bamboo plantations require very little maintenance. Bamboo also requires very little water and can survive harsh weather conditions such as drought, flooding and high temperatures.
  • Reclaims land - Because of its rapid growth and root structure, bamboo can, in a very short time, reclaim land destroyed by overgrazing and over-building and clean the soil of toxins. 
  • Decreases soil erosion - Yearly replanting of crops such as cotton leads to soil erosion. The extensive root system of bamboo and the fact that it is not uprooted during harvesting means bamboo actually helps preserve soil and prevent soil erosion. 
  • Slows deforestation - Bamboo planting can slow deforestation, providing an alternative source of cellulose fibre for the textile industry. It allows communities to turn away from the destruction of their native forests and to construct commercial bamboo plantations that can be selectively harvested annually without the destruction of the grove. 
  • Can be grown without pesticides - Bamboo can be grown without pesticides or chemicals because of it's own anti-bacterial agent. 
  • Can be harvested sustainably - Bamboo is one of the fastest growing plants on the planet, making it a high yield renewable resource. It can be selectively harvested annually and is capable of complete regeneration without the need to replant. 
  • 100% biodegradable - Bamboo fibre is a natural product derived entirely from plant cellulose and is biodegradable in soil by micro organisms and sunlight. Having reached its useful life, clothing made from bamboo can be composted and disposed of in an organic and environmentally friendly manner. Synthetic fibres such as nylon and polyester are not biodegradable and remain in landfill for longer.

Benefits to people

Our bamboo t-shirts are endorsed by the Fairwear Foundation (FWF) who represent Ethical Trade & Justice for Workers. They exist to promote fair labour conditions in the garment industry worldwide.


100% organic cotton tote bags

Our tote bags are made from certified organic cotton. Which means from field to factory to you, there are no nasties involved.


The Styles & Sizes

We are keeping things simple to start with and only offering our prints on to white t-shirt and natural coloured tote bags. We do have plans to offer more colour options after we have funded the first run of t-shirts and totes.

Womens 

We have two styles of t-shirt for women to choose from. 

1. Classic fit

Classic t-shirt fit. 


2. Raglan fit

Slightly more feminine cut and fit with a scooped neck and cropped sleeve. 


Mens

1. Classic fit

For men we have one style of t-shirt, the classic fit. 


The Vision and the Future

Here are a few of the many ideas that we have for the future of Katkin.

  • Hoodies, vests/tanks, underwear, other clothing
  • Recycled and recyclable wooden jewellery
  • Bamboo bed linen and towels
  • Childrens clothing
  • Yoga & workout wear


About Me

I have over 11 years experience working for some of the biggest brands on the planet, like Virgin, Sky and The Times. I have also run my own conscious branding company called Thought Cloud here in Sydney for the last 18 months, so I know what it takes to create the strategy for a strong and enduring brand. 

Most importantly I have a big heart and wish to contribute positively to people and the planet. And I believe that entrepreneurs and small businesses have a wonderful opportunity to change the world for good through using their profits for a purpose. 

I wish to inspire people to start and run businesses that are conscious and mindful about their practices and how they interact with people and the planet through kindness and compassion. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Not to worry if you can't contribute financially, you can still help us spread the word about the campaign. We would love it if you could:

  • Like our Facebook page and share it with others on your wall
  • Join our Facebook event and invite any friends and family who you think would like to support our campaign
  • Email the link to our Indiegogo page to any friends or family who you think would like our tees and totes > http://igg.me/at/katkin
  • Share our link on your Facebook page > http://igg.me/at/katkin

==============================================

Heartfelt thanks

A huge thank you to everyone who contributes to our campaign and who spreads the word to help make Katkin happen. 

Lots of love,

Kat & Darren x x x


Video: Kat Kinnie & Darren Foley

Photography: Kat Kinnie & Darren Foley

Music: Rights kindly granted for 'All I Ever Wanted' by Mark Wilkinson. To learn more and buy his latest album 'Let The River Run' visit his website: markwilkinsonmusic.com

Requires less energy & water to grow - It takes much less energy to grow and sustain bamboo than cotton. Bamboo plantations require very little maintenance. Bamboo also requires very little water and can survive harsh weather conditions such as drought, flooding and high temperatures.


Reclaims land - Because of its rapid growth and root structure, bamboo can, in a very short time, reclaim land destroyed by overgrazing and over-building and clean the soil of toxins. 


Decreases soil erosion - Yearly replanting of crops such as cotton leads to soil erosion. The extensive root system of bamboo and the fact that it is not uprooted during harvesting means bamboo actually helps preserve soil and prevent soil erosion. 

Slows deforestation - Bamboo planting can slow deforestation, providing an alternative source of cellulose fibre for the textile industry. It allows communities to turn away from the destruction of their native forests and to construct commercial bamboo plantations that can be selectively harvested annually without the destruction of the grove. 

Can be grown without pesticides - Bamboo can be grown without pesticides or chemicals because of it's own anti-bacterial agent. 


Can be harvested sustainably - Bamboo is one of the fastest growing plants on the planet, making it a high yield renewable resource. It can be selectively harvested annually and is capable of complete regeneration without the need to replant. 


100% biodegradable - Bamboo fibre is a natural product derived entirely from plant cellulose and is biodegradable in soil by micro organisms and sunlight. Having reached its useful life, clothing made from bamboo can be composted and disposed of in an organic and environmentally friendly manner. Synthetic fibres such as nylon and polyester are not biodegradable and remain in landfill for longer.
Benefits to peopleOur bamboo t-shirts are endorsed by the Fairwear Foundation (FWF) who represent Ethical Trade & Justice for Workers. They exist to promote fair labour conditions in the garment industry worldwide.100% organic cotton tote bagsOur tote bags are made from certified organic cotton. Which means from field to factory to you, there are no nasties involved.The Styles & SizesWe are keeping things simple to start with and only offering our prints on to white t-shirt and natural coloured tote bags. We do have plans to offer more colour options after we have funded the first run of t-shirts and totes.Womens We have two styles of t-shirt for women to choose from. 1. Classic fitClassic t-shirt fit. 2. Raglan fitSlightly more feminine cut and fit with a scooped neck and cropped sleeve. Mens1. Classic fitFor men we have one style of t-shirt, the classic fit. The Vision and the FutureHere are a few of the many ideas that we have for the future of Katkin.
Hoodies, vests/tanks, underwear, other clothing
Recycled and recyclable wooden jewellery

Bamboo bed linen and towels

Childrens clothing

Yoga & workout wear
About MeI have over 11 years experience working for some of the biggest brands on the planet, like Virgin, Sky and The Times. I have also run my own conscious branding company called Thought Cloud here in Sydney for the last 18 months, so I know what it takes to create the strategy for a strong and enduring brand. Most importantly I have a big heart and wish to contribute positively to people and the planet. And I believe that entrepreneurs and small businesses have a wonderful opportunity to change the world for good through using their profits for a purpose. I wish to inspire people to start and run businesses that are conscious and mindful about their practices and how they interact with people and the planet through kindness and compassion. Other Ways You Can HelpNot to worry if you can't contribute financially, you can still help us spread the word about the campaign. We would love it if you could:

Like our Facebook page and share it with others on your wall

Join our Facebook event and invite any friends and family who you think would like to support our campaign

Email the link to our Indiegogo page to any friends or family who you think would like our tees and totes > http://igg.me/at/katkin


Share our link on your Facebook page > http://igg.me/at/katkin

==============================================Heartfelt thanksA huge thank you to everyone who contributes to our campaign and who spreads the word to help make Katkin happen. Lots of love,Kat & Darren x x xVideo: Kat Kinnie & Darren FoleyPhotography: Kat Kinnie & Darren FoleyMusic: Rights kindly granted for 'All I Ever Wanted' by Mark Wilkinson. To learn more and buy his latest album 'Let The River Run' visit his website: markwilkinsonmusic.com

story:
What is this "Roller Derby" Stuff?

Roller derby is taking the nation by storm. Every day, more and more women and girls are finding their place in the world - in the rink! While we aren't the roller derby of the 70's with all the throat punching and clotheslining, we are still a group of empowered, strong, in-your-face women. We'll knock each other down, give her the bruise of a lifetime and then buy her a beer afterwards. We'll dress derby (booty shorts, fishnets and knee high socks!), go to practice, then do our grocery shopping afterwards - because derby makes us confident enough to do so. 

So, it's about time to be able to show everyone you're a derby girl without sporting the booty shorts (hey, it gets cold sometimes!). Or maybe you're a fan of derby and want to show your support. You're a ref and don't want to wear your zebra stripes all the time? No prob!

Get Whipped Clothing will be launching a brand that caters to everyone in the derby world. We will have t-shirts and booty shorts to get started. We will eventually be your one-stop-shop for derby apparel - from our cornerstone t-shirts to funky socks and frilly tutus. 

Who Are You, Anyway?

My name is Kat Tastrophy and I have just recently been drafted to my first team. I got really interested in roller derby a couple of years ago and have been following it since. After I moved to a smaller town and found out they had a league - I joined up as soon as I found out who to talk to. I started learning the ropes this past June, and just went through freshmeat (derby vocab for "newbie") training and testing. Derby is quite the life-changer - let me be honest. It's a confidence booster to the extreme, it's a supportive environment, and everyone always fits in. Once I strap those skates on - I'm a different person, and I like her alot. :)

When I'm not on my wheels, I'm a website, graphics and t-shirt designer by trade. I've been doing that for about 10 years now. I'm also a mom, a soon-to-be-wife and an online student. 

What We Need 

You Want Details!

  • First run of shirts and transfers. 
  • Packaging and labeling supplies. 
  • Funds to attend Rollercon and other trade events.
  • Our website, print materials and t-shirt designs will be done by yours truly. No funds needed in this department. 
  • Funds to pay the photographer for our upcoming website photo shoot.
  • Our basic needs are for initial stock and minimal other startup funds. 

The Line

We plan to print on high-quality, super-soft, pre-shrunk fitted tees. This type of tee was chosen because it a) feels great to wear, b) a fitted tee makes a girl feel sexy in a t-shirt (which is hard to do, sometimes) and c) it's what my league requested I use :)

Our booty shorts will be high-quality boy cut shorts made from comfort conscious ringspun cotton and spandex.

Example phrases you may see on a Get Whipped item: 

  • I'm not a superhero, but I do wear tights. 
  • Blockers don't wear panties.
  • Roller Derby : Women's Anger Management Since 1935

And a couple of booty short examples : 

  • I had tacos for lunch!
  • Whip Me

We will also have graphic-only styles, with stylized roller skates, characters, roller girls, etc. 

Check out the gallery for our currently designed Launch Shirts! (More to come!)

Other Ways You Can Help

Can't cough up the cash? No problem-o!

  • Know some girls who "do derby"? Tell 'em about us! Keep us in mind for that perfect Christmas/Birthday/Anniversary/President's Day gift!
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

And we will love you forever. Promise.

story:
vFit’s mission is to help every shoe shopper find exactly what they’re looking to buy in the size they need to buy it in, and to help every shoe brand and retailer, both large and small, be easily accessible to those shoppers.

There is a fundamental problem with buying shoes online, which is finding the proper size that fits. Online footwear retailers experience on average 1 of every 4 pairs of shoes returned (25%) primarily due to improper fit. vFit technology can help solve that issue.

Online footwear sales in the U.S. grew to over $8 Billion in 2012 and growing at a rate of 17% annually. That translates to $2 Billion in shoes being returned. That’s a staggering number when you look at it this way! 

Personally, I love the convenience of buying shoes online, but I feel guilty buying three of the same shoes in three different sizes at the same time, knowing that I will keep one pair and return the two that don’t fit. Even when the retailer will pay for free returns, I know somebody ultimately pays.

There must be a better way...

vFit Shoes App was developed to help customers make better-educated decisions when deciding what shoe and size to buy and from what retailer to can get the shoes from.

Even with the enormous growth of Web search and comparison-shopping sites, consumers still lack an easy way to shop for the proper fitting shoes and to be confident in the size they need. That is, until now. 

vFit is the only shoe fitting technology that allows shoe buyers the ability to compare the exact shape of their feet to the inside shape of shoes to visualize and determine the best size and fit. To demonstrate this process we are developing a vertical search engine for shoe shopping that puts every product, every store, every sale, coupon and discount, right at your fingertips. 

Ten years ago we started a company that invented a kiosk/scanner FormaLogix YouTube which allowed people to capture a 3D image of their feet and virtually try shoes on. The kiosks were too costly for most retailers to buy but in reality, those retailers were afraid customers would use the scans to buy shoes from other online only retailers.

We were forced to rent space in several malls in California to place the kiosk/scanners and had positive feedback from customers, but that business model was far too expensive, we couldn't attract venture capital so we realized we needed a more cost effective way to get people scanned. Over 60,000 people used the kiosk/scanners and we received valuable data on the actual size and shape of all those feet. But what was truly amazing was when customers used their scans to buy shoes online, only 3% of those shoes were ever returned!

Fast-forward to 2013 and over 100 million people the U.S. own smartphones with a digital camera. vFit is leveraging the patented technology we developed for the kiosk/scanners and placing it into an easy to use smartphone App. 

No matter what shoe you’re looking for, you can find the hard-to-find style, the best deal and the right fit. vFit Shoes crawls the entire web and with its search technology helps shoppers discover every shoe, online shopping has to offer. We have access to over 2 million products from more than 60 online merchants. Our goal is to not only make them universally accessible through our comparative shopping site (vFitShop.com) but also allow you to virtually try them on with a scan of your own feet.

vFit makes shoe shopping more efficient. Enabling shoppers to virtually try on shoes and find the product that fits, all within a single user experience. 

With vFit, shoppers can quickly and easily discover: 

  • What size of a certain style fits their feet or fits the person who they’d like to shop for. Moms, you will now be able to store your entire families feet in your account and buy proper fitting shoes without the hassle of guessing or returning wrong sizes.
  • The best available price for a product, determined from all the merchants carrying that item and size 
  • Those hard-to-find items, or that unique and rare find. vFit offers a variety of benefits to shoppers

For some it's finding the lowest price or the best deal; for others it's a perfect gift and being confident that it will also fit. Shoppers can save all their favorite styles and searches in their own virtual closet for convenience and future reference. They also can save their favorite brands and sizes to make a more personalized shopping experience on their own. We are developing a unique algorithm that learns how you like your shoes to fit and that algorithm will be used to make better-fit recommendations. Just think, the more you styles you have in your closet the better the fitting experience becomes.

At vFit Shoes we're committed to continually improving our offerings and your shopping experience.

We need your support to help use reach our goal to raising enough money that will allow our team to finish the iPhone development and launch the comparative shopping site. Any additional capital we are able to raise will be allocated to help us fast track the Android App, Windows APP and integrate more brands to get their shoes “vFitable”.

We currently have over 60 of the most prestigious footwear retailers in the U.S. and once we have successfully launched the App in the U.S. we plan to open up similar comparative shopping portals in India, Australia, Europe, Canada, Japan and China.

Please help us make this App a reality! Share our campaign with all your friends and family who want an easier way to buy shoes online. Every dollar we raise will go directly into paying for software development and more employees that will help us get this product to market and make the user experience even better.

The Venture Capital “Blue Suit Guys” don't care if this App exists, simply because old guys don't buy shoes online, or would they ever consider buying shoes for their children. That’s why we need the indiegogo crowd to get this funded.

We are building this App with the “Mother-of-3 in mind.” She understands the challenge of finding shoes that her children want to wear in the sizes that actually fit and that's a time consuming job… We need thousands of these women to jump onboard with their donations of $10 or more. Come on Ladies, show these VC’s who really drives shoe sales!

Gone will be the days of having to guess if a shoe will fit when buying it online. Welcome to the Future of Fit!

Thank you for your support!

story:
Short Summary

In the US, more than 32 million pairs of athletic shoes are purchased online each year. Of these pairs, 44% are returned back to the shoe departments stores because they did not turn out to be what the customer expected.

FitNFind is a website that decreases the uncertainty with online shopping. Never again will you have to regret purchasing shoes online that don’t fit correctly.

By simply uploading three images of your foot, FitNFind will connect to its database to recommend multiple pairs of shoes that are appropriate to your feet based on different characteristics such as length, width, arch height, ankle pronation, etc.


What We Need & What You Get

FitNFind needs help funding the different factors that are imperative for the company. We would greatly appreciate every donation given to us. 

As of now, we have a software in which we manually analyze the images of the foot. We would like to grow to the point where our software can automatically pick up the different characteristics of the foot based on reference points, color, etc. 


FitNFind T-Shirt Available:



    Who We are

    Co-Founded by Asmita Choppa, Dalia Lache, Jamie Shen, and Rohan Balan, FitNFind started in Cambridge, Massachusetts in the Massachusetts Institute of Technology. Our team has assembled as a result of a high school entrepreneurship program called Launch, which as been temporarily funding our company.
