story:
CLICAR AQUÍ PARA LA VERSIÓN EN ESPAÑOL 
WIN A CUSTOM SHIRT
WHAT DO YOU LIKE TO HAVE IN A SUIT? MAYBE AN INCORPORATED CHARGER FOR THE MOBILE PHONE? NANOFIBER FABRICS SO IT DOES NOT STAIN?
We are giving a Custom Shirt to the most creative answer in Twitter, using the hashtag #BlackpierGOGO
CLICK HERE TO ANSWER AND PARTICIPATE
----------------------------------
The story behind Blackpier

"Reinvent yourself or die" - We could say that this was the concept that had in common the founders of Blackpier when they decided to meet for the first time to consider their future.

Each and every founder are passionate about fashion and, therefore, soon it came out questions as: "Aren't you tired of having to follow the fashion standards? I want to create my own style"; "Why do I have to pay a fortune if I want to have exclusivity?"; "How many times have you already seen two people with the same garment?". And, suddenly, the idea came out! - "We could take benefit of the new technologies to create a platform from where we could offer distinction and customization, and accessible to everybody!".

Blackpier was born from the idea of revolutionizing the fashion market and making arrive to as many people as possible a way of dressing that had seemed to be forgotten: the custom tailoring.

Why custom?

Nowadays, mass production is taking over fashion. But fashion is much more than clothes manufactured in huge factories with standard sizes. It is necessary to remember that fashion is an art, a social and cultural phenomenon that defines us daily.

In Blackpier we are convinced that the center of all the attention lies on you. We make custom clothes that perfectly adapt to your body and, for this reason, they will make you feel better. More time for yourself, more savings and an unlimited level of customization are just some of the advantages you will benefit if you have Blackpier in mind when you need to purchase your clothes.



Why do we come to Indiegogo?

At present, Blackpier has 2 years and a half of life  and, in this time, we have succeeded in making people buy their clothes in a diferent way they were used to.

With the passage of the time, we have realized that, to the initial idea of Blackpier, it has joined the important fact to know that we have created a response to the demand of a public with dressing problems. We are happy to know that people with difficulties to buy in conventional shops had found in us not only a solution, but a new way of enjoying clothes they want to have. But not only this; we see that people who have no time to go from one store to another looking for what they really need, they have also make us know their happiness with Blackpier.

After finding out the world of crowdfunding, we saw on it a great oportunity to ask for the help we need to make arrive our project to the maximum number possible of people.

Where are the campaing fundings going to?
  • To expand our product and services to those men who have problems when dressing with standard sizes and to those who don't find what they like in conventional shops.
  • To create new collections with new styles from the last fashion trends, which implies having the advantage of bespoke garments in fashion clothes.
  • To satisfy women's demand, after having received many request from women to help them solve their problems when dressing suits and shirts for work.
  • To revolutionize the classic tailoring sector by merging fashion and technology.

ABOUT BLACKPIER

With a unique and innovative online system, Blackpier has revolutionized the way men shop suits and has made buying a custom suit as simple as buying an app from AppStore.

Most men don’t like shopping and they may find this experience of buying a suit frustrating and intimidating. Blackpier takes the stress out of shopping and lets men buy a suit from the comfort of their home or office. Once a customer has created their online measurement profile (which takes about 10 to 15 minutes) ordering a custom suit takes less than a minute.

Every Blackpier suit is individually made for customer’s unique measurements. And with most suits priced around $269, Blackpier makes custom-tailored clothes accessible to a mass market. Suits are available exclusively online at www.blackpier.com/en-US  .

We take care of your garment in every detail

Finding your tailored style is possible thanks to the Blackpier´s traditional tailoring and shirting.

With our tailoring professionals, the choice is yours

If what you want is to feel good with your clothing, to enjoy the best fabrics and handmade clothing, stitch by stitch, this is your best choice. 
It is possible that you, like many other people, don´t easily find what you are looking for, because your style and measures can fall outside the standards of clothing produced in industrial manufacturing. Thanks to our tailors, you will never suffer again the discomforts of a jacket too tight; or a shirt that fits well around the neck but it´s too loose or tight around the rest of the body; or pants that, when your are sit, they are too long. 


With custom tailoring, you will feel better. 

You can choose your own style and customize it quickly and easily. We offer a variety of fabrics and styles depending on the latest fashion trends and with new designs and fabrics. 
Our collection allows you to choose the texture, pattern and color, getting the personalized and unique style you want for your suit or shirt. 

Detailed attention and meticulous handicraft. 

Our garments are handicraft by our tailors, using only traditional methods. 
Our obsession is to take care of every detail to give maximum satisfaction. 
From the thoroughness of the opened button holes and sews by hand, to the particular embroidery of the inside of the pocket. Every garment made by Blackpier is the result of the meticulous handicraft and detailed work made by our tailors, with over 20 years of experience, thinking only of your satisfaction at the time you feel it like a glove. 

The most rigorous care comes to your door.  

Because once completed, your garment is presented and protected in an exclusive and special unique packaging that will protect its content in the long journey to your home. 

We welcome you to the world of Blackpier; prepare yourself to live a unique experience and to enjoy your own style of dressing tailored clothes. 


Customer opinions

In order to achieve the maximum clarity and confidence in your purchases, we offer you the best reviewing service. You will be able to consult real opinions from our customers, and you will also be able to review our product once you have placed your order.

The latest comments:

"Great service,best quality and very good prices!!" 5/5

"Good atention and fast response" 5/5

"Excellent" 5/5

"Satisfecho al 100%, todos los productos perfectos a un precio ideal. Lo recomiendo !" 5/5

You can find more reviews in the link below:

https://www.ekomi.co.uk/review-blackpiercom.html


Blackpier in media


Other ways to help us: You can also share this campaign on social networks

CONSIGUE UNA CAMISA
¿QUÉ TE GUSTARÍA QUE TUVIERA UN TRAJE? ¿TAL VEZ UN CARGADOR INCORPORADO PARA EL MÓVIL? ¿O TELAS DE NANOFIBRA PARA QUE NO SE MANCHE?
Regalaremos una Camisa a Medida a la respuesta más creativa en Twitter, utilizando el hashtag #BlackpierGOGO
CLICAR AQUÍ PARA CONTESTAR Y PARTICIPAR
----------------------------------
La historia detrás de Blackpier

"Reinventarse o morir" - Podríamos decir que ese era el concepto que tenían en común los fundadores de Blackpier cuando decidieron reunirse por primera vez para plantearse su futuro.

Cada uno de los fundadores son unos apasionados de la moda y, por lo tanto, pronto empezaron a surgir preguntas del estilo: "¿No estáis cansados de tener que seguir los estándares de la moda? Quiero crear mi propio estilo."; "¿Por qué tengo que pagar una fortuna si quiero exclusividad?"; "¿Cuántas veces habéis visto ya a más de una persona con la misma prenda de ropa?". Y, de repente, ¡la idea surgió! - "¡Podríamos aprovecharnos de las nuevas tecnologías para crear una plataforma desde la que podamos ofrecer distinción y personalización a un precio accesible para todos!".

Blackpier nació de la idea de revolucionar el mercado de la moda y de hacer llegar al máximo número de personas una manera de vestir que parecía haber quedado en el olvido: la sastrería a medida.

¿Por qué a medida?

Hoy en día, la producción en masa se está imponiendo en el mercado de la moda. Pero la moda es mucho más que piezas de ropa confeccionadas en grandes industrias con tallas estándares. Es necesario recordar que la moda es un arte, un fenómeno social y cultural que nos define día a día.

En Blackpier estamos convencidos de que el centro de atención debe recaer en ti. Por eso, confeccionamos prendas que se adaptan perfectamente a tu cuerpo y, por esa razón, te hacen sentir mejor. Más tiempo para ti, más ahorro, y un ilimitado nivel de personalización son sólo algunas de las ventajas de las que podrás beneficiarte si tienes a Blackpier en mente en el momento de renovar o ampliar tu vestuario.



¿Por qué acudimos a Indiegogo?

Actualmente, Blackpier tiene 2 años y medio de vida y, durante este tiempo, hemos conseguido hacer que la gente se haga con su ropa de una manera diferente a la que estaban acostumbrados.

Con el paso del tiempo, nos hemos dado cuenta de que, a la idea inicial de Blackpier, se le ha sumado el importante factor de saber que hemos creado una respuesta a la demanda de un público con dificultades para vestir. Nos enorgullece saber que estas personas con problemas para comprar en tiendas convencionales han encontrado en nosotros no sólo una solución, sino una nueva manera de disfrutar de la ropa que ellos quieren tener. Pero no sólo eso; también vemos que, personas que no tienen tiempo para ir de una tienda a otra buscando lo que realmente necesitan, nos hacen llegar su contento con Blackpier.

Después de descubrir el mundo del crowdfunding, hemos visto en él una gran oportunidad para pedir la ayuda que necesitamos para hacer llegar nuestro proyecto al máximo número de personas posible.

¿Dónde irán a parar los fondos de la campaña?
  • A expandir nuestros productos y servicios a esos hombres que tienen problemas para vestir con tallas estándar y a aquellos que no encuentran ropa que les satisfaga en las tiendas convencionales.
  • A crear nuevas colecciones con nuevos estilos acordes a las tendencias en la moda, lo que implica tener la ventaja de ofrecer moda actual en la ropa a medida.
  • A satisfacer la demanda de la mujer. Después de haber recibido muchas peticiones de mujeres con problemas para vestir trajes y camisas para trabajar, queremos poder abastecer también al público femenino con prendas a medida.
  • A revolucionar el sector clásico de la moda, fusionando moda y tecnología.

ACERCA DE BLACKPIER

Con un sistema online único e innovador, Blackpier ha revolucionado la manera en que los hombres compran trajes y ha conseguido hacer que el adquirir trajes a medida sea tan fácil como descargarse una aplicación desde la AppStore.

A la mayoría de los hombres no les gusta ir de compras y pueden enfrentarse a una experiencia frustrante e intimidatoria. Blackpier elimina el estrés de realizar las compras y permite que los hombres puedan hacerse con un traje a medida desde la comodidad de su casa u oficina. En cuanto el cliente ya ha creado su perfil de medidas (sólo se necesitan unos 10 o 15 minutos), pedir un traje a medida cuesta menos de 1 minuto.

Cada traje Blackpier está confecionado para un único individuo. Y, con la mayoría de trajes a un precio de 199,95€, Blackpier hace que la sastrería a medida sea accesible a un gran público. Los trajes están disponibles online en www.blackpier.com/es  .

Mimamos tu prenda en cada detalle

Encontrar tu estilo a medida ya es posible gracias a la sastrería y camisería tradicional de Blackpier. 

Con nuestros profesionales de la medida, la elección es tuya

Si lo que deseas es sentirte bien con tu vestuario, disfrutar de las mejores telas y de una confección artesanal, puntada a puntada, ésta es tu mejor elección. 
Es probable que, como otras muchas personas, no encuentres fácilmente lo que estás buscando, ya que tu estilo y medidas quedan fuera de los estándares de la ropa producida en la confección industrial. Gracias a nuestros sastres, nunca más volverás a sufrir las incomodidades de una chaqueta demasiado ajustada; o una camisa que se ajusta bien alrededor del cuello, pero es demasiado holgada o ajustada alrededor del resto del cuerpo; o los pantalones que al sentarse le quedan demasiado largos.


Con la sastrería a medida, te sentirás mejor 

Podrás escoger tu propio estilo y personalizarlo de una forma rápida y sencilla. Ofrecemos una variedad de tejidos y estilos, en función de las últimas tendencias de la moda y con nuevos diseños y tejidos. 
Nuestra colección permite elegir la textura, dibujo y color, consiguiendo así el estilo personalizado y único que usted desea para su traje o camisa. 

La atención al detalle y la artesanía meticulosa

Nuestras prendas están confeccionadas de forma artesanal por nuestros sastres, utilizando sólo métodos tradicionales. 
Nuestra obsesión está en cuidar al máximo cada detalle para darle una satisfacción máxima. 
Desde la meticulosidad de los ojales abiertos y cosidos a mano, hasta el particular bordado del bolsillo interior. Cada prenda elaborada por Blackpier es fruto del escrupuloso trabajo artesanal y minucioso por parte de nuestros sastres, con más de 20 años de experiencia, pensando únicamente en su satisfacción en el momento en que usted se la sienta como un guante.

El cuidado más riguroso llega hasta la puerta de tu casa  

Porque una vez terminada, tu prenda es presentada y protegida en un embalaje especial de diseño exclusivo, que protegerá el producto en el largo trayecto hasta tu casa.

Te damos la bienvenida al mundo Blackpier. Prepárate para vivir la experiencia única de disfrutar de tu propio estilo de vestir a medida. 


Opiniones de los clientes

Con la finalidad de conseguir la máxima transparencia y confianza en tu compra, ponemos a su disposición el mejor servicio de valoración. Podrás consultar opiniones reales de nuestros clientes, y dejar las tuyas propias una vez hayas realizado tu compra.

Los últimos comentarios:

"Great service,best quality and very good prices!!" 5/5

"Good atention and fast response" 5/5

"Excellent" 5/5

"Satisfecho al 100%, todos los productos perfectos a un precio ideal. Lo recomiendo !" 5/5

Puedes encontrar más valoraciones en el siguiente enlace:

https://www.ekomi.co.uk/review-blackpiercom.html


Blackpier en los medios

Estaríamos muy agradecidos si pudieras compartir esta campaña con tus amigos, utilizando Facebook y Twitter. Sólo te tomará 10 segundos compartir el siguiente enlace:

Copiar y pegar - http://igg.me/at/blackpier
story_txt:
CLICAR AQUÍ PARA LA VERSIÓN EN ESPAÑOL 

WIN A CUSTOM SHIRT


WHAT DO YOU LIKE TO HAVE IN A SUIT? MAYBE AN INCORPORATED CHARGER FOR THE MOBILE PHONE? NANOFIBER FABRICS SO IT DOES NOT STAIN?

We are giving a Custom Shirt to the most creative answer in Twitter, using the hashtag #BlackpierGOGO


CLICK HERE TO ANSWER AND PARTICIPATE

----------------------------------
The story behind Blackpier
"Reinvent yourself or die" - We could say that this was the concept that had in common the founders of Blackpier when they decided to meet for the first time to consider their future.
Each and every founder are passionate about fashion and, therefore, soon it came out questions as: "Aren't you tired of having to follow the fashion standards? I want to create my own style"; "Why do I have to pay a fortune if I want to have exclusivity?"; "How many times have you already seen two people with the same garment?". And, suddenly, the idea came out! - "We could take benefit of the new technologies to create a platform from where we could offer distinction and customization, and accessible to everybody!".
Blackpier was born from the idea of revolutionizing the fashion market and making arrive to as many people as possible a way of dressing that had seemed to be forgotten: the custom tailoring.
Why custom?
Nowadays, mass production is taking over fashion. But fashion is much more than clothes manufactured in huge factories with standard sizes. It is necessary to remember that fashion is an art, a social and cultural phenomenon that defines us daily.
In Blackpier we are convinced that the center of all the attention lies on you. We make custom clothes that perfectly adapt to your body and, for this reason, they will make you feel better. More time for yourself, more savings and an unlimited level of customization are just some of the advantages you will benefit if you have Blackpier in mind when you need to purchase your clothes.


Why do we come to Indiegogo?
At present, Blackpier has 2 years and a half of life  and, in this time, we have succeeded in making people buy their clothes in a diferent way they were used to.
With the passage of the time, we have realized that, to the initial idea of Blackpier, it has joined the important fact to know that we have created a response to the demand of a public with dressing problems. We are happy to know that people with difficulties to buy in conventional shops had found in us not only a solution, but a new way of enjoying clothes they want to have. But not only this; we see that people who have no time to go from one store to another looking for what they really need, they have also make us know their happiness with Blackpier.
After finding out the world of crowdfunding, we saw on it a great oportunity to ask for the help we need to make arrive our project to the maximum number possible of people.
Where are the campaing fundings going to?

To expand our product and services to those men who have problems when dressing with standard sizes and to those who don't find what they like in conventional shops.
To create new collections with new styles from the last fashion trends, which implies having the advantage of bespoke garments in fashion clothes.
To satisfy women's demand, after having received many request from women to help them solve their problems when dressing suits and shirts for work.
To revolutionize the classic tailoring sector by merging fashion and technology.

ABOUT BLACKPIER
With a unique and innovative online system, Blackpier
has revolutionized the way men shop suits and has made buying a custom suit as
simple as buying an app from AppStore.
Most men don’t like shopping and they may find this experience of buying a suit frustrating and intimidating. Blackpier takes the stress out of shopping and lets
men buy a suit from the comfort of their home or office. Once a customer has
created their online measurement profile (which takes about 10 to 15 minutes)
ordering a custom suit takes less than a minute.
Every Blackpier suit is individually made for
customer’s unique measurements. And with most suits priced around $269,
Blackpier makes custom-tailored clothes accessible to a mass market. Suits are
available exclusively online at www.blackpier.com/en-US 
.
We take care of your garment in every detail
Finding your tailored style is possible
thanks to the Blackpier´s traditional tailoring and shirting.With our tailoring professionals, the
choice is yours
If what you want is to feel good with your clothing,
to enjoy the best fabrics and handmade clothing, stitch by stitch, this is your
best choice. 
It is possible that you, like many other people, don´t easily find what you are
looking for, because your style and measures can fall outside the standards of
clothing produced in industrial manufacturing. Thanks to our tailors, you will
never suffer again the discomforts of a jacket too tight; or a shirt that fits
well around the neck but it´s too loose or tight around the rest of the body;
or pants that, when your are sit, they are too long. 


With custom tailoring, you will feel
better. 
You can choose your own style and customize it quickly and easily. We offer a
variety of fabrics and styles depending on the latest fashion trends and with
new designs and fabrics. 
Our collection allows you to choose the texture, pattern and color, getting the
personalized and unique style you want for your suit or shirt. 
Detailed attention and meticulous
handicraft. 

Our garments are handicraft by our tailors, using only traditional
methods. 
Our obsession is to take care of every detail to give maximum
satisfaction. 
From the thoroughness of the opened button holes and sews by hand, to the
particular embroidery of the inside of the pocket. Every garment made by
Blackpier is the result of the meticulous handicraft and detailed work made by
our tailors, with over 20 years of experience, thinking only of your satisfaction
at the time you feel it like a glove. The most rigorous care comes to your
door.  
Because once completed, your garment is presented and protected in an exclusive
and special unique packaging that will protect its content in the long journey
to your home. 
We welcome you to the world of Blackpier; prepare yourself to live a unique
experience and to enjoy your own style of dressing tailored clothes. 


Customer opinions

In order to achieve the maximum clarity and confidence in your purchases, we offer you the best reviewing service. You will be able to consult real opinions from our customers, and you will also be able to review our product once you have placed your order.
The latest comments:
"Great service,best quality and very good prices!!" 5/5
"Good atention and fast response" 5/5
"Excellent" 5/5
"Satisfecho al 100%, todos los productos perfectos a un precio ideal. Lo recomiendo !" 5/5
You can find more reviews in the link below:
https://www.ekomi.co.uk/review-blackpiercom.html

Blackpier in media

story:
The Office Bro Kit is the first and only starter kit for the mature bro, and man does it make a GREAT gift!

Bro’s are everywhere; if you are not a bro yourself chances are you at least know one. Bro’s aren’t just obnoxious party alpha males often seen aggressively high fiving each other with a red solo cup in one hand; they are also people, and people grow up. Bro’s grow up. Bro’s graduate. They get jobs, they run empires, they get married, and they even become bro dads. While the bro tank and aviators may spend more time in the closet for the average mature bro we’d like to think a little bit of the bro never dies.

A true bro knows the secret in life is to work hard and play hard but it is a known scientific fact that the warm glow of fluoresce office lights adversely affect a bro’s ability to fist pump and fight evil. For emergency situations when bro-glow reaches a dangerously low level we’ve created the Office Bro Kit. The Office Bro Kit includes everything the mature bro needs to stay focused on the job and avoid ultimate bro-limination.


The Office Bro Kit includes:

  • A sweet office bro mouse pad that is soft yet firm – Required for any office bro-grammer
  • An even sweeter office bro mug perfect for coffee and Jägermeister – SWAG
  • A grip strengthener and stress release ball – keep your handshake game tight
  • An emergency 6 cup pong set - Obviously
  • The shotgun – a shotgun, bottle opener in one – how a mature bro prepares a beer eloquently
  • Emergency shutter sun glasses – blocks 0% of UV rays and are 100% awesome
  • An American flag bandana – a mature bro is patriotic (currently US only but we have love for bro’s of all nationalities)
  • Ten Office Bro Kit business cards – cuz the mature bro’s gotta network Be Bro-Fessional!
http://www.officebrokit.com/about2.html

Testimonials:

  • “Practical, yet absurd” – my next-door neighbor
  • “I want two!” – some guy
  • “What?” – my mom
  • “Finally a place to keep my shutter shades and American flag bandana in one place” – the brofather
  • “As if I wasn’t already the envy of the office, the OBK put me over the top” – The boss
  • “I don’t get it” – an anti-bro (Someone who is the opposite of a bro. He does not chill at all, does not play lacrosse, does not pack D's, and ruins everything.)


Why Indiegogo? While Bro Kits are awesome, they are not cheap. We want to build a high quality yet cost effective kit in order to make it available to all bro’s at the best possible price. We've done the research and, thanks to some aggressive negotiation, we've gotten printing and raw goods cost down to $3,000 for the first batch of Office Bro Kits.

If you are unable to contribute to this project, please at least share our video!

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_RjzycLr_7o

“Practical, yet absurd” – my next-door neighbor
“I want two!” – some guy
“What?” – my mom
“Finally a place to keep my shutter shades and American flag bandana in one place” – the brofather
“As if I wasn’t already the envy of the office, the OBK put me over the top” – The boss
“I don’t get it” – an anti-bro (Someone who is the opposite of a bro. He does not chill at all, does not play lacrosse, does not pack D's, and ruins everything.)



Why Indiegogo? While Bro Kits are awesome, they are not cheap. We want to build a high quality yet cost effective kit in order to make it available to all bro’s at the best possible price. We've done the research and, thanks to some aggressive negotiation, we've gotten printing and raw goods cost down to $3,000 for the first batch of Office Bro Kits.
If you are unable to contribute to this project, please at least share our video!
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_RjzycLr_7o

story:
Who is Lewd Louise?

Lewd Louise is an alternative-lingerie line that uses UNDERWEAR to express modern feminist sentiments about gender stereotypes and sex politics. We're sick and tired of cutesy, passive lingerie with little dots and hearts and bows - if underwear is meant to be looked at, then why not use it to say something LOUD?! 

Lewd Louise was founded by Ruby Gertz, a recent fashion design school graduate who still believes that despite the harsh fashion industry climate, we can still save the world (or at least make a difference) through clothing. Ruby has been recognized for her idealistic reimaginings of the fashion world by the YMA Fashion Scholarship Foundation, as well as the Geoffrey Beene Annual Fashion Scholarship. She started Lewd Louise in October of 2013, and plans grow the company into well-known brand that fuels a culture of sex-positivity and body love and acceptance. 


Why DickPanties?

The whole concept behind DickPanties is about challenging gender roles and stereotypes in a way that is accessible, goofy, sex-positive, and fun. DickPanties are a snarky retort to outdated concepts like penis envy, and the privileges and attributes traditionally associated with having a male organ. 

Gender (how we perceive ourselves on the spectrum of male to female) can be more fluid than most people acknowledge, and there are so many identities one can have that fall outside of the traditional male/female binary, and so DickPanties provide a way to explore gender fluidity in a way that's non-threatening and kind of just straight-up hilarious. 

DickPanties have sparked some really stimulating conversations about gender roles and societal expectations, as well as enthusiastic musings on the possible outcomes that DickPanties could have: both on the wearer and potential "viewers." What if you wore DickPanties to a business meeting? What if you wore them on a date? What if you packed a pair in your luggage on a flight to Brazil? What if you forgot you were wearing them until you had to go to the bathroom? 


Why Is This Important?

We've realized that lots of people want to participate in this little social experiment, even if just for the sake of their own personal amusement. We created the brand Lewd Louise with the intention of shedding light on controversial sex and body-image related issues through secret fashion statements that are fun, easy, and comfortable to wear, making these topics of thought and conversation accessible to more people. 

When people get comfortable talking about and addressing their own personal identity versus society's expectations, it gives them confidence and a sense of agency over their own body. When you love yourself and everything you are, not only will you be happier, but you will have an easier time being tolerant of others as well!


What  We Need

We are asking for $10,000 to assist us with propelling Lewd Louise to a level of functional operation that we can feel good about! 

First, we are eagerly exploring local production options. The underwear we are currently selling is overstock bought from a wholesaler, but it is made in Bangladesh and we think that's kinda shady. We would love to be able to assure you that Lewd Louise underwear is made here in the United States by American workers who are compensated fairly! 

We have been doing extensive research to find factories in the United States that can provide us with a similar product, but switching from printing on overstock underwear to getting underwear made in a factory is a complicated and expensive process. We need to source all of our materials first in order to provide them to the factory, and in order to get wholesale prices we must meet minimum order requirements. 

We would love to know that there is substantial interest in our products before we go ahead and invest in producing large amounts of them!

Though sourcing materials and manufacturers is an arduous process, we are excited that working directly with a manufacturer will give us greater agency over the quality of our products and give us more control over the final designs!

Our goal is to be able to increase our product line to include different cuts and styles of underwear for different body types, as well as a wider variety of snarky designs! Squeezeboxers© (boxer-brief underwear with ladybits) and Lewd Food© (such as the avocado and pizza panty mockups in the video) are already in the works, and will be available soon once we receive funding!

Second, we need about $1,000 to help us finalize the set-up of our business. We have already filed an LLC with the state of New York, but we need to file several additional licenses and forms in order to be considered a legitimate business. 


What You Get

We currently have about 200 pairs of DickPanties in stock. If you order a pair by January 20th, we will do our best to ship them to you by Valentine's Day (February 14th) so you can show them to someone special!

If we sell out of our stock, you can still order a pair and once we are funded, we will produce more DickPanties and send them to you! 

Small contributions will not go unnoticed! For $5-$25 donations, we are offering DickPanties postcards, bumper stickers, and logo stickers as a token of our thanks! 

We are also offering some very unique and special items to those who donate larger sums, including limited edition Lewd Louise tote bags with our motto "WE CAN ALL BE DICKS SOMETIMES," as well as screen-printed art posters with the body-positive mottos "NO MORE FAT TALK" and "RIOTS NOT DIETS" imposed over historically significant representations of women, Botticelli's Venus and The Woman of Willendorf, respectively.

Even if you cannot afford a pair of underwear at this point in time, any small donation, even $1, is a confirmation to us that there are enough people out there who believe in our brand's message and that this is a mission worth carrying out! Do you want to see more body-positive images in underwear ads? Do you want your underwear to make you giggle and feel smitten with yourself, rather than passive and objectified? If you answered yes to either of those, please support Lewd Louise!


Other Ways You Can Help

Not about to part with your green, but still think Lewd Louise is an underwear revolution that the world needs? Do us a huge favor by spreading the word about our brand! Post about it on your Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Tumblr, whatever! Just help us get the word out! We are confident that there are enough supporters out there to help us reach our goal, but we could totally use your help connecting to them!





Check out more pictures from our photo shoot on our website, www.lewdlouise.com.

story:
Now available at www.dashwallets.com

 

DudeIWantThat: "Thin, fast, and smart in the way we humans like to ascribe intelligence to inanimate objects..."

GearCulture: "The stylish, slimline design puts an end to embarrassing trouser pocket bulging and also enables access to your most used cards without the need to ever take them out. Get swiping."

MovementsandNonsense: "Not only is this wallet thinner, but it’s design allows for one to quickly slide out credit cards for a smooth purchase transaction."

BerkeleySG: "Having a Dash wallet would be incredibly convenient and make life a little simpler."

RogueBardMedia: "I think that’s a pretty sweet deal for something that adds a lot of convenience to the way you carry your cash and plastic."


TechSmartt: "To sum up, DASH is the future. Not only does DASH feature what you want/need in a wallet, but the minimalistic, stylish body will attract all."

Feel free to mix and match rewards or add any additional wallet for $20! Check the FAQ for more info on add-ons. International Shipping is $10 for 2 Wallets and $12 for 3 Wallets.

 

Dash requires less effort from you than any other wallet.

 
 
Swipe your favorite card, without ever having to take it out.
 

Dash has 2 compartments for cards; a quickdraw slot, and a second compartment for carrying the rest of your cards and IDs.

Dash is thin. Very thin.

If card isn't accepted, Dash carries cash in its third compartment on the bottom.

Cash can be placed in the third, bottom compartment.

Dash is much faster than the average wallet.

The average wallet just takes too long.

Traditional wallets are uncomfortable to have in your back pocket and too bulky for front pockets or jacket pockets. Fumbling cards or mashing cash into your wallet at the register is never a good look.

Do your pants a favor with the Dash Wallet.

Dash's minimal design makes it convenient to take anywhere, from the gym to coffee runs. 

Limited Edition Kickstarter Dash

Design:

Dash Wallets are made of black elastic fabric, using recycled fibers. It was created with elasticity so that you can hold however much you need. The wallet is designed using only one piece of material to provide optimal durability and a minimal frame.

Check out a demo HERE

Feel free to finally leave out receipts, coins, movie stubs, and old gift certificates you'll never use. Carry the things you need, and access them easily.

Access to the rest of your cards and IDs is effortless.

Dash comes in 8 colors: Red, SF Orange, Yellow, Purple, Teal, Navy, Black, White (not pictured).

WHY JOIN TEAM DASH?

  • Dash is the perfect size to carry everything you need.
  • Everyone has one favorite card to use; Dash will give you instant access to it.
  • You can use this card without ever having to take it out of your wallet.
  • In some instances, you won’t be able to use cards, so Dash carries cash.
  • Pricing starts at only $15 for early birds. That's like a movie and popcorn.
  • Your clothes will fit better.
  • You can choose from 8 different colors.
  • They can fit in any pocket or purse.
  • They are great for holding ID cards and RFID.
  • They can better organize and distribute business cards.
  • Everyday life can be chaotic. Perhaps this could help make it a bit simpler.
  • Help make loved ones' everyday lives simpler by gifting one.

Production:

After numerous assessments on fabrics and blueprints, we have finished designing the wallet using only one piece of material to ensure a minimal frame and durability for a final prototype. We can now start production of the wallets for the public.

Your Support:

This is where crowdfunding come in. We need your help to transform this idea into a reality and then transport it into your pockets. We are raising funding for manufacturing, packaging, and logistics for Dash. Your support for the production of these wallets will help to make everyday life a little less complicated. Thank you for taking the time to check out the project.

Sharing it with loved ones takes only a second, and it would mean the world to us. Join Team Dash!

Hi Res Photos Here

Who We Are:    

Steven Elliot is part of startup design company Elliot Havok. Our goal is to bring you the highest quality products that merge practicality and sophistication.

For further information, media, and a gallery, refer to: www.elliothavok.com

story:
The Story

While attending the largest leather convention in the world in Milan, Italy, I came up with the idea of a backpack for modern professionals.  I wanted something that would travel comfortably, and that would organize all of my gear, while still looking like a high-end bag. 

Features

The Modern Day Briefcase is designed with two leather handles, padded shoulder straps, a laptop sleeve with secure strap, pen and business card holders, and 8 internal pockets.  The bag comes in in three different colors and two different sizes.

 

Materials

To make sure that the Modern Day Briefcase is durable and will last throughout your career, we started with the best materials.  

We are sourcing our leather from La Bretagna in Italy, one of the premier tanneries in the world.  This leather is durable, and will also age and become more beautiful over the course of your career.  

For the exterior of the bag, we chose a 10 oz. waxed cotton to make the bag water resistant and durable. In addition, we used the most reliable zippers on the market, YKK zippers, to ensure that the bag will last.

Design

Creating a bag that was professional and functional was not easy.  I spent countless hours coming up with the concepts that brought the Modern Day Briefcase to life.  After numerous iterations, I was able to come up with the design that perfectly combines the look and feel of a high-end satchel, with the functionality of a backpack. 

Product Specifications

The bag comes in two different sizes: regular and small.  The regular bag will fit up to a 17'' inch laptop.  The small bag will fit up to a 15'' inch laptop.

Production

I elected to make this bag with manufacturers that I know and trust to ensure that these bags are made of the highest quality. Production for this bag will occur as fast as possible; however, I will not cut any corners, and I will hold the manufacturers to the highest quality standards.  

About Me

Hello! My name is Joseph May. I am a recovering attorney who has worked for enough people to last a lifetime.  After realizing how much I disliked attorney life, I worked for a startup as the director of operations for awhile, before I decided to risk it all, and become an entrepreneur full-time. 

This bag project was jump-started by Mark Cuban. Really, no joke! When I was considering whether or not to make this bag, I came across the following quote by Mark Cuban:

[E]very entrepreneur's job is to invent the future. I also call it ‘kicking your own [butt].” Someone is out there who thinks they have a better idea than you have. A better solution than you have. A better or more efficient product than you have...it's part of your job as the owner of the company to stay ahead of them. http://www.entrepreneur.com/article/222501.

After reading this quote, I decided I was not going to be the guy who stood on the sidelines saying, “I came up with that idea first, but I was too busy.” From that day on, I started waking up at 4 am, so that I could work on the project for three hours before I went to work. Now a year later, I am finally launching this bag.  

I have a bunch of kids (4) and a beautiful wife who keeps me on my toes.  If I'm not in the office, I'm probably road biking.  

Thank you

Thank you to all of my friends, family, and backers who have supported and encouraged me throughout this whole process. I could not have done this without you!  I would especially like to thank my wife who has supported and encouraged me along the way.  Also, I would like to thank the following people who have helped me throughout my campaign:

Industrial Design: Damien Pacheco 

Graphic Design: Nancy Jones

Video: Big Door Network

Photography: Weston Colton

Models: Sebastian Meyer, Ashley Coppins, & Chase Coppins

Cheerleader Squad: Saul Santos, Jacob Carter, & Chris Padilla

story:
Meet The Other Danish Guy™

We are making world's most comfortable underwear in an innovative and sustainable way.

"A burning sensation in your buttocks doesn’t generally tend to lead to pleasant things. For The Other Danish Guy, it did" - Good News from Finland.

No more chafing! Sore a** on a business trip to NYC was a starting point to our underwear brand. Three years later the story is less about chafing and more about being the first men’s underwear brand to use regenerated fabric made with ocean plastics.

 

 

The Indiegogo Ocean Discovery Collection

We are launching world's first SmoothShell underwear collection exclusively here at Indiegogo. Our backers have the unique opportunity to be the first ones to wear the future fashion and have the most comfortable premium underwear made of regenerated ocean plastics.

We had an open voting for our current customers and pre-backer list about different colours and combinations for perks on our Facebook page. As a result we have pre-selected color sets for Traveller Trunk and Globetrotter Boxer.

 

Traveller Trunk: Trunks are quickly becoming the favourite cut for underwear among men in the know. Why? Trunk cut is a hybrid of brief and boxer brief without the heap of fabric.  Simply put they are boxer briefs with short legs and a square appearance. If you usually like briefs but want to try something a little different, consider trunks. Our trunks come with the fly and they’re great for everyday, dressing up, going out and moderate sports. You can wear trunks with just about anything. Our size chart and measurement instructions can be found at the end of this page.

 

Globetrotter Boxer Brief: Most comfortable boxer briefs will cover about half of your thigh. They offer protection from chafing during workouts and sports.  With a moderate rise on the waist, our boxer briefs come without the fly and provide the same support as standard briefs - but with a complete coverage. Great for everyday wear or all sports. Excellent for use at a gym, on bike or motorcycle, paddling and other activities. Our size chart and measurement instructions can be found at the end of this page.

 

What You Get & What is Our Goal

By backing us now you will get a discounted price for premium underwear, be among the first ones wearing the future fashion and help in cleaning the oceans. It only takes a few seconds to be one of the pacemakers and help us in transforming the fashion industry towards more sustainable business so please join as a backer today!

We are aiming to raise at least $20,000 in order to:

  1. Ramp up the SmoothShell production
  2. Expand our operations outside Scandinavia
  3. Invest further in research and development to create even more sustainable products

We have spent nearly two years on research, design and testing. After intensive testing and getting feedback from real customers of +5000 pairs of underwear we are finally ready to scale up. For us, being from Scandinavia, it means growing global. And for that we will need Your help.

Every delivered Perk is a small win for our planet's future. In return we want You to feel comfortable with clear conscience, love Your underwear and be our customer and friend for life.

Where does the price (MSRP $37,90) come from?

Recycled materials  cost more than the traditional ones, but when its use becomes more common, eventually the price of the raw material comes down. Another thing is that, even if our underwear is not meant to be worn from father to son, we want to make premium quality that lasts longer.

Production & Delivery Timeline

We have already started the pre-production and the first perks are under quality control. Perks are produced colour by colour and we will be ready with the first 2000 perks in late July/early August. We will start shipping out the perks in August and the delivery time is approximately one week from the shipment, depending from your country of origin. If we go past of $100.000 in funding, we will start another production line and continue shipping normally in August and September until all the perks are fulfilled.

Our and Your Footprints

We all have the chance to make a difference. The truth is, however, that it is often easier to speak about values than act based on those. By making everyday choices environment-friendly, we are making it easy to make a difference and help in saving the oceans and our planet.

Customer Reviews

We have been testing and continuously developing the products with real customers for over a year now. Here is some feedback that we received:

You can read more product reviews from our brand store at: https://theotherdanishguy.com

As seen on


The promise of The Other Danish Guy™

  1. Our underwear will never chafe Your ass
  2. All our products are of premium quality and environment friendly
  3. We will never stop learning and developing the products & the materials based on the promises above
  4. We will be open to You about our designs and progress and continue making the world a better place
  5. We will always keep listening to our customers, employees and business partners 

Questions and Answers

Q: Where does the brand name come from?

A: You can see the story behind The Other Danish Guy™ from the video below. For some of you this might be heavy stuff and some can even find the content inappropriate. If so; sorry. But this is how it really happened. We're just telling the truth. 

Q: What kind of plastic is used to generate the yarn or fabric?

A: Below is a list of sources for plastic we use to turn into fabrics and products.

  • Fishing nets (spent fish farming nets and ghost fishing nets)
  • Fluff (the upper part of old, spent Nylon carpets)
  • Industrial plastic waste
  • Yarn discards
  • Fabrics sraps (with a special take-back program with Aquafil S.p.A and Speedo USA)

Q: How does this work in detail?

A: Our fabrics are produced using Econyl yarn. You can read more about the process in detail from Econyl website.

 

How to find your fit?

Our measurements are a bit smaller (meaning that our trunks and boxer briefs are larger) when compared to peers like the respected Calvin Klein or Hanes or Björn Borg. Compared to the cotton-elastane boxer briefs or trunks our fit is true size. If you consider whether, for example, it is M or L that will fit you, we suggest that you pick the smaller size. Men, often in general, buy too large underwear. Our fabric stretches two-way so you could actually find the smaller size to feel and fit you better!

Below is our size chart. Please note that the inch size is not the inch size of your jeans! For the best possible fit you can use measure tape to be sure about the right fit. Or, then again: just choose the smaller if you are not sure which one is better.

Risks and challenges

The Other Danish Guy™ is a fully-operational brand. Although this is a special funding project, it’s not outside the realm of what we do every day. As we’re a brand and not factory owners, there’s always the risk of a factory closure or an inability to produce at our primary facility due to capacity issues. In the unlikely event of such an occurrence, The Other Danish Guy™ will move production to another facility that we’ve already vetted. Should we face issues with our material suppliers, we also have alternative suppliers should the need arise.

The Team

This is us - The Other Danish Guys. We are not only an underwear brand but passionate, honest and humble individuals creating amazingly comfortable underwear that you'll simply fall in love with.

Our CEO Tommi has helped hundreds of brands in their strategy work to grow their business. Ari has been working in the field of clothing and production for 30+ years and is our wizard of supply chain. Harri is a seasoned business professional and the voice of reason in the company. Kimmo takes care of the design and spirit of The Other Danish Guy™ and Juha over distribution chain and most of the touching points of our brand. We are all super proud of being part of this great team.

Please Spread the Word - Every Share Makes a Huge Difference

It would mean a world for all of us if you could help in creating some buzz around the campaign. We are forever grateful to you if you could:

  • Share the campaign link with one of the Indiegogo's share tools
  • Tell your friends and family about the campaign
  • Contribute either by backing us or participating in the discussion on our Facebook page

INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING:

International shipments may be subject to import taxes, duties and customs fees, which are levied once your package reaches the country of destination, and are the responsibility of the recipient. Most of the orders shipped are tax free and we will pay the VAT for every order shipped within EU. US customers can purchase US$800 worth of perks from us without having to pay the burden of duty taxes.

EXCHANGE POLICY:

If you follow the sizing chart carefully, then our underwear shall fit you perfectly. They are true fit and do not shrink. Still, if you wish to exchange your underwear for any reason, we’ll happily do that for all unopened cans but you’ll have to pay for the two way shipping. As we are just starting up and offering the perks at highly discounted prices, we won’t be able to accept returns.

We accept exchanges up to 30 days of you receiving the perk(s).

All exchanges must have an RMA (Return Merchandise Authorization). Shipping your order back without an RMA reference number will cause a delay in processing.

To initiate an exchange, please email our team at team@theotherdanishguy.com

We will respond back with further instructions on how to return your underwear back to us.

REFUND POLICY:

Indiegogo will honor a refund if you do happen to change your mind with 2 days of backing our campaign. 

Unfortunately, we do not offer refunds or returns on items received as Indiegogo perks.
Crowdfunding allows us to build our brand by collecting backer assessments, investing in improvements for our current project, and supply funding to our future designs. Supporting us as a backer, you pledge your support by choosing a perk/reward and is not a retail purchase.  Look at it as a way of supporting a really awesome idea and having the privilege to try a new conceptual product.  

Help! I have not received my perk

To ship your perk(s), we will need to know where to ship them. For that we will use the address you have filled into Indiegogo platform. If you want to change your shipping address, please read the instructions in here: https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles...

Once we start processing the perk orders, we will lock the orders one by one. For shipping we will use UPS and other shipping companies. You will receive a shipping confirmation and a tracking link from us from https://theotherdanishguy.com/

If your e-mail has changed, kindly send us a message at team@theotherdanishguy.com with your backer ID, name, and previous e-mail and we will handle it from there!

Thank you!

The Other Danish Guy™ Team

Media Kit

 

Our Partners

 

SPECIAL THANKS

Video credits: Sampo Mansnerus / Top Light Productions

Photography credits: Petri Kovalainen & Ofer Amir

Footprint Photo - Syd Sujuaan / Unsplash.com
story_txt:
Meet The Other Danish Guy™
We are making world's most comfortable underwear in an innovative and sustainable way."A burning sensation in your buttocks doesn’t generally tend to lead to pleasant things. For The Other Danish Guy, it did" - Good News from Finland.

No more chafing! Sore a** on a business trip to NYC was a starting point to our underwear brand. Three years later the story is less about chafing and more about being the first men’s underwear brand to use regenerated fabric made with ocean plastics.
 

 
The Indiegogo Ocean Discovery Collection
We are launching world's first SmoothShell underwear collection exclusively here at Indiegogo. Our backers have the unique opportunity to be the first ones to wear the future fashion and have the most comfortable premium underwear made of regenerated ocean plastics.

We had an open voting for our current customers and pre-backer list about different colours and combinations for perks on our Facebook page. As a result we have pre-selected color sets for Traveller Trunk and Globetrotter Boxer.
 

Traveller Trunk: Trunks are quickly becoming the favourite cut for underwear among men in the know. Why? Trunk cut is a hybrid of brief and boxer brief without the heap of fabric.  Simply put they are boxer briefs with short legs and a square appearance. If you usually like briefs but want to try something a little different, consider trunks. Our trunks come with the fly and they’re great for everyday, dressing up, going out and moderate sports. You can wear trunks with just about anything. Our size chart and measurement instructions can be found at the end of this page.
 

Globetrotter Boxer Brief: Most comfortable boxer briefs will cover about half of your thigh. They offer protection from chafing during workouts and sports.  With a moderate rise on the waist, our boxer briefs come without the fly and provide the same support as standard briefs - but with a complete coverage. Great for everyday wear or all sports. Excellent for use at a gym, on bike or motorcycle, paddling and other activities. Our size chart and measurement instructions can be found at the end of this page.
 
What You Get & What is Our Goal
By backing us now you will get a discounted price for premium underwear, be among the first ones wearing the future fashion and help in cleaning the oceans. story:
Are You Still Ignoring Your Nail Health?

Studies have shown that human nails grow 1mm per week, and 1g nail dirt contains 4 billion bacteria. Our hands might be the dirtiest part of body, they touch so many things everyday. Not to mention our nails which are much easier to accumulate dirt and spread infections. And Everyone is aware that nails accumulate dirt and have more chance of spreading infections. We go to gym or eat healthy food to keep body healthy, how about our nails? They are also essential parts that can guard your finger tips from scratch and injures. Healthy nails cannot be ignored anymore..

Cutting or trimming nails looks like the simplest thing in our life. However, the simplest thing  is always neglected. And subsequently we let them grow and get infected. Or, we cut them too much and get hurt. So, trimming them in a right way becomes a very important thing.

Why Not Other Nail Clipper?

Do you have the same worries? Trimming nails precisely with scissors can be a hard time, especially for infants and elders.  As what we said above, it should be a simple work. 

Does an ordinary electric nail clipper save your nail? No, bad electric nail clipper can only hurt your nail day by day. Low power can not only make this process longer, but also hurt your nails. Loud noise is also a big problem. You don't want to attract others attention when you are clipping nails, do you?

We Are Here to Help

Never get struggle with shaping and polishing your nails. With our Electric Nail Clipper, clipping nails can be so easy and enjoyable. Cutting, manicuring & grinding, it cares your nails all-around.

Effortless: Clips nails in seconds with a simple touch of a button. Give the work to the machine,  give your life more rest.

Safe: Pain free and precisely engineered for fingernails. Do not suffer from hurting your skin anymore, especially for children and elderly.

Gentle: Nails are clipped smoothly without file. One finger a time, give you a perfect nail in seconds.

Rechargeable: A quick charge is good for months of clippings.

Portable: Weighs only 120g. Take it with you, keep your nail clean and pretty everyday.

Built-to-Last: Aluminum alloy blade for precise trimming. No more over-cuttings.

We Are Different

Unlike regular scissors, it is quick and pain free to use. Just a simple push of on/off switch, enjoy your manicure time.

Easy to use even in the night

"It's so dark in the night, I can't even find the clipper!" Don't worry, this nail clipper has LED for night use. Surprised? Yes, it is always ready to use. Soft front LED light to increase precision and reduce eyestrain, perfect for tiny nails. Also can be used as a flashlight.

Cuts your nail quickly and smoothly so that you precious time is saved. Following the four steps below and enjoy your clipping time.

 

No mess, no worries

Nail crumbs are captured in an easy-to-empty groove. Mess-free design means no nail filings scattered all over the place. It's clean and hygienic. Open the cap and the crumbs are all stored there. Empty it after several uses. No mess to your home, no mess to your life. 

USB Charging

Charge for two hours, use for 90 days. With a USB cable, you can charge it by your laptop, power bank and your car. It's so convenient and fast. Give it another life can be this simple.

Waterproof IPX5

Drop it in the water? Want to use it when taking a bath? No problem, it is totally waterproof and you can clean it with water.

It's working, but it's quiet

We use the whisper-quiet motor to make this process fast but quiet.  Noiseless nail file clipper allows you to trim and polish while your families are sleeping.

It's for Everyone

Infants and young children are often scratched by nails. If the nail is too short, it is easy to hurt the fingertips. If the nail is too long, it is easy to hide dirt and bacteria.

Don't risk cutting your baby with sharp Nail Clippers & Nail Scissors! File your their nails with a lighter touch, in any direction, without damaging the nail cuticles or soft nail beds.

Even if your eyesight is not good, or you are the elderly, our electric nail clippers will not hurt your skin.

Risks and Challenges

We can guarantee that first shipment will go out no later than June 2019 if we successfully get funded. We are committed to meet your expectations without any possible delay in production or delivery. We rate the risk of unexpected delay as being very low.

story:
We are proud to introduce the new watch in our collection.Valhalla of Norway ORM is inspired of norse mythology. The watch has an 8215 automatic movement and a sapphire crystal. The Bezel is inspired of Midgaardsormen.  Delivery is set to december/january 2017/18.

ABOUT VALHALLA OF NORWAY

We started up in 2012 in Fredrikstad, Norway, but the idea was already there in 2007. The first watch Aasgaard  was ready in 2013.  Five models followed (Valhalla,Bragi, Baugi, Andrimne and Balder), and now Orm is comming.

The Design

Is inspired of norse mythologi, the Bezel got inspiration from midgardsormen. The second hand from Mjölnir.

The case and movement

The case is made of 316L Stainless steel and has a sapphire crystal.
The movement is Japan 8215 automatic. 

Specifications

*Automatic 8215 movement
*Sapphire crystal
*All stainless steel
*Water ressitant 10 ATM
*44mm
*Date
*Genuine leather strap
*Wooden box

 We have launched Orm Green limited edition 25 pcs only.

story:
Ayant la fibre entrepreneuriale, après mes études en gestion de production du vêtement, j’ai démarré ma compagnie de maillots haut de gamme, confectionnés au Québec, avec mon associé et créateur Pascal Labelle. S’en est suivi plusieurs défilés à Paris, à Las Vegas, à New-York et à Montréal.

J’organise une levée de fonds pour deux raisons précises.

1-  Liquider l'ancienne collection pour faire connaître la marque Anne-Krystel.

2-  Financer une partie de la nouvelle collection de maillots haut de gamme.

Il est important pour moi d’agir selon mes valeurs. Voilà pourquoi j’ai décidé d’encourager notre économie locale en créant des emplois équitables au Québec. En participant à ma levée de fonds, vous contribuerez au succès d’une entreprise Montréalaise, tout en nous aidant à soutenir les travailleurs d’ici.

Les 8000$ serviront à acheter des nouveaux tissus, importés d'Europe. En échange de votre donation, vous pourrez choisir parmi plusieurs contreparties offertes.

20$ = une affiche dédicacée à votre nom

50$ = un masque pour les yeux au collagène

100$ = un flacon de 50ml du parfum AK

150$ = un maillot de votre choix (parmi les modèles disponibles)

400$ = trois maillots de votre choix (parmi les modèles disponibles)

800$ = un défilé privé, avec 3 mannequins professionnelles, à l’endroit de votre choix (certaines conditions s’appliquent)

Si je n'atteins pas l’objectif fixé, il me sera quand-même possible d’acheter du tissu, mais en moins grande quantité. Étant une femme tenace et persévérante, j’ai confiance d’arriver à mes fins, peu importe les moyens. Être entrepreneur signifie avoir le courage de prendre des risques calculés, de faire de notre mieux et de garder la tête haute.

Vous pouvez compter sur la marque Anne-Krystel pour des produits de qualité supérieure, pour encourager une compagnie équitable et pour développer l’économie québécoise.

Créons ensemble un monde plus juste, plus conscient, pour un avenir meilleur pour tous les humains.

Merci de passer le mot à tous vos contacts ; VOUS FAITES LA DIFFÉRENCE.
story_txt:
Ayant la fibre entrepreneuriale, après mes études en gestion de
production du vêtement, j’ai démarré ma compagnie de maillots haut de gamme,
confectionnés au Québec, avec mon associé et créateur Pascal Labelle. S’en est
suivi plusieurs défilés à Paris, à Las Vegas, à New-York et à Montréal.
J’organise une
levée de fonds pour deux raisons précises.
1-  Liquider l'ancienne collection pour faire connaître la marque Anne-Krystel.

2-  Financer une partie de la nouvelle collection de
maillots haut de gamme. 
Il est important pour moi d’agir selon mes valeurs. Voilà
pourquoi j’ai décidé d’encourager notre économie locale en créant des emplois
équitables au Québec. En participant à ma levée de fonds, vous contribuerez au
succès d’une entreprise Montréalaise, tout en nous aidant à soutenir les
travailleurs d’ici. 
Les 8000$ serviront à acheter des
nouveaux tissus, importés d'Europe. En échange de votre donation, vous pourrez choisir parmi
plusieurs contreparties offertes.
20$ = une affiche dédicacée à votre
nom
50$ = un masque pour les yeux au
collagène
100$ = un flacon de 50ml du
parfum AK
150$ = un maillot de votre choix
(parmi les modèles disponibles)
400$ = trois maillots de votre
choix (parmi les modèles disponibles)
800$ = un défilé privé, avec 3
mannequins professionnelles, à l’endroit de votre choix (certaines conditions s’appliquent)
Si je n'atteins pas l’objectif fixé,
il me sera quand-même possible d’acheter du tissu, mais en moins grande
quantité. Étant une femme tenace et persévérante, j’ai confiance d’arriver à
mes fins, peu importe les moyens. Être entrepreneur signifie avoir le courage
de prendre des risques calculés, de faire de notre mieux et de garder la tête
haute. 
Vous pouvez compter sur la marque Anne-Krystel
pour des produits de qualité supérieure, pour encourager une compagnie équitable et pour développer l’économie québécoise.
Créons ensemble un monde plus juste, plus conscient,
pour un avenir meilleur pour tous les humains.
Merci de passer le mot à tous vos contacts ; VOUS FAITES LA
DIFFÉRENCE.

story:
Check out our women's collection: igg.me/at/chiccollection



First time to Indiegogo?

It's super easy!

  1. Decide how many Sleek Supply watches & straps you would like, then click the pink button that says, "GET THIS PERK."
  2. Choose your favorite watch style & band color.
  3. Fill out your shipping information and continue with your payment.
  4. You receive your order & enjoy your new watch when production is finished.

What is Sleek Supply Co all about?

We're not excited about fashion. We're excited about the idea of versatility. All of our founders grew up in a place where timeless fashion is the best fashion. Where cool & casual outlives loud & trendy. We stick to the ideology that trends fade, but authenticity is timeless. We hope you're with us on that.

What specifications are we looking at?

Case Material: 316L Stainless Steel
Case Diameter: 43 mm
Dial Window Material: Hardened Mineral Glass
Movement: Japanese Quartz
Water Resistant: 3ATM/30 Meters
Watch Band Material: Genuine Italian Leather (Interchangeable)
Watch Band Width: 20 mm
Bezel Width: 2 mm
Crown Size: 5 mm

The Two Year Warranty

We are so confident with the quality and durability of our watches, that if something were to happen within the first 2 years, we hope you will send it back to us.  

If the watch parts or mechanics don’t work properly, and it’s our fault, we will repair or replace your product for free. This does not cover any abuse you might put your watch through on your own. The warranty does not cover water damage, normal wear and tear, batteries, accidental glass damage, scratches, strap discoloration, or theft. 

Meet The Team

Contact us: curran@sleeksupply.com

We Need Your Support!

This is a great opportunity to benefit mutually. By pledging for one of our watches on Indiegogo, you'll not only help a small business grow, but you'll also receive a badass watch at a fraction of its normal price! 

If you are unable to pre-order a watch, we would still love some extra support. You don't have to share this on your Facebook or tweet it to the world, but if you know someone that this would be perfect for, send them a message to check our campaign out. It goes a long way and follows our philosophy of building personal connections instead of marketing to the masses.
